detailsOne: Treating certain types of gingivitis between dental visits as part of a professional program. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Peridex solution is a topical antimicrobial. It works by reacting with the microbial cell surface, destroying the cell membrane, and killing the cell.

detailsTwo: PerioGard solution is a topical antimicrobial. It works by reacting with the microbial cell surface, destroying the cell membrane, and killing the cell.

detailsOne: Managing and relieving mouth pain and irritation that may occur as a result of oral surgery, braces, dentures, disease, or following cancer chemotherapy or radiation therapy. It may also be used to treat mouth ulcers or for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Gelclair gel is a bioadherent oral gel. It works by coating the mouth to help relieve mouth pain and irritation.

detailsOne: Relieving dry mouth and throat.
detailsTwo: NeutraSal powder is an artificial saliva. It works by moistening and lubricating the mouth and throat.

detailsOne: Kepivance (palifermin) is a manmade form of a human protein that affects growth of cells within the tissues lining your mouth and digestive tract (esophagus, stomach, and intestines).
detailsTwo: Kepivance is used to help prevent or heal mouth sores and ulcers in people being treated with chemotherapy and stem cell treatment.

detailsOne: Acclean is an oral rinse containing 0.12% chlorhexidine gluconate (1,1’-hexamethylene bis [5-(p-chlorphenyl) biguanide]di-D-gluconate) in a base containing water, 11.6% alcohol, glycerin, PEG-40 sorbitan diisostearate, flavor, sodium saccharin and FD&C Blue No. 1. Relieving dry mouth and throat.

detailsOne: Naglazyme (galsulfase) is used to treat some of the symptoms of a genetic condition called mucopolysaccharidosis VI (MYOO-koe-pol-ee-SAK-a-rye-DOE-sis type 6), or MPS VI, also called Maroteaux-Lamy syndrome.
detailsTwo: MPS VI is a metabolic disorder in which the body lacks the enzyme needed to break down certain sugars and proteins. These substances can build up in the body, causing enlarged organs, abnormal bone structure, changes in facial features, breathing problems, heart problems, vision or hearing loss, and changes in mental or physical abilities.

detailsOne: Ilaris (canakinumab) is a monoclonal antibody that blocks certain proteins in the body that can affect inflammation and other immune responses. Ilaris is used to treat certain types of periodic fever syndromes, sometimes called auto-inflammatory syndromes.
detailsTwo: Periodic fever syndromes are rare and often inherited conditions caused by mutations in certain genes; usually genes that are involved in producing a certain protein or enzyme in the body. People with a periodic fever syndrome have episodes of fever and inflammation without other causes such as infection or virus.

detailsOne: Elaprase (idursulfase) is an IV infusion used to treat some of the symptoms of a genetic condition called Hunter's syndrome, also called mucopolysaccharidosis (MYOO-koe-pol-ee-SAK-a-rye-DOE-sis).
detailsTwo: Hunter syndrome is a metabolic disorder in which the body lacks the enzyme needed to break down certain sugars and proteins. These substances can build up in the body, causing enlarged organs, abnormal bone structure, changes in facial features, breathing problems, heart problems, vision loss, and changes in mental or physical abilities.

detailsOne: Arcalyst (rilonacept) is used to treat some of the symptoms of rare genetic conditions such as Familial Cold Auto-inflammatory Syndrome (FCAS) or Muckle-Wells Syndrome (MWS).
detailsTwo: FCAS and MWS are inflammatory disorders in which the body develops certain symptoms without a known cause (such as virus, bacteria, or illness). These symptoms include fever, chills, fatigue, and joint pain. More serious symptoms may involve the bones and joints, the central nervous system (deafness, vision loss, mental impairment), or major organs such as the kidneys.

detailsOne: Copaxone (glatiramer) is a combination of four amino acids (proteins) that affect the immune system.
detailsTwo: Copaxone is used to treat multiple sclerosis (MS) and to prevent relapse of MS.

detailsOne: Tysabri (natalizumab) is a monoclonal antibody that affects the actions of the body's immune system. Monoclonal antibodies are made to target and destroy only certain cells in the body. This may help to protect healthy cells from damage.
detailsTwo: Tysabri is used to treat relapsing forms of

detailsOne: Gilenya (fingolimod) is an immunosuppressant. It works by keeping immune cells trapped in your lymph nodes so they can't reach the central nervous system (brain and spinal cord).
detailsTwo: Gilenya is used to treat relapsing
(MS) in adults.

detailsOne: Ampyra (dalfampridine) is a potassium channel blocker.
detailsTwo: Ampyra is used to improve walking in patients with multiple sclerosis (MS). Dalfampridine produced an increase in walking speed in clinical trials. Exactly how it works is not known. It is thought to increase nerve function.

detailsOne: Rebif (interferon beta-1a) is made from human proteins. Interferons help the body fight viral infections.
detailsTwo: Rebif is used to treat relapsing multiple sclerosis (MS). This medication will not cure MS, it will only decrease the frequency of relapse symptoms.

detailsOne: Aubagio (teriflunomide) affects the immune system and reduces swelling and inflammation in the nervous system.
detailsTwo: Aubagio is used to reduce flare-ups in people with relapsing
(MS).

detailsOne: Tecfidera (dimethyl fumarate) is a prescription medicine used to treat relapsing multiple sclerosis.
detailsTwo: Tecfidera may also be used for purposes not listed in this medication guide.

detailsOne: Avonex (interferon beta-1a) is made from human proteins. Interferons help the body fight viral infections.
detailsTwo: Avonex is used to treat relapsing multiple sclerosis (MS). This medication will not cure MS, it will only decrease the frequency of relapse symptoms.

detailsOne: Treating certain conditions associated with decreased adrenal gland function. It is also used to treat severe inflammation due to certain conditions, including severe asthma, severe allergies, rheumatoid arthritis, ulcerative colitis, certain blood disorders, lupus, multiple sclerosis, and certain eye and skin conditions. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Decadron is a corticosteroid. It works by decreasing or preventing tissues from responding to inflammation. It also modifies the body's response to certain immune stimulation.

detailsOne: Betaseron (interferon beta-1b) is made from human proteins. Interferons help the body fight viral infections.
detailsTwo: Betaseron is a prescription medicine used to reduce the number of relapses in people with relapsing forms of
(MS). This includes people who have had their first symptoms of multiple sclerosis and have an MRI consistent with multiple sclerosis.

Reducing disability and the number of relapses in certain patients with multiple sclerosis. It is used along with other medicines to treat acute nonlymphocytic leukemia (ANLL) or advanced prostate cancer in certain patients. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.

detailsOne: Preventing and treating nausea, vomiting, and dizziness caused by motion sickness. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.

detailsOne: Vimizim (elosulfase alfa) is used to treat some of the symptoms of a genetic condition called mucopolysaccharidosis (MYOO-koe-pol-ee-SAK-a-rye-DOE-sis) IV (4) type A, or MPS IV A, also called Morquio A syndrome.

detailsOne: Lucentis (ranibizumab) is made from a human antibody fragment. It works by keeping new blood vessels from forming under the retina (a sensory membrane that lines the inside of the eye). detailsOne: Ozurdex implants contain dexamethasone, a corticosteroid used to treat inflammation.
detailsTwo: Ozurdex is an implant injected into the eye to treat swelling that may occur when there is a blockage of certain blood vessels in your eyes.

detailsOne: Eylea (aflibercept) is made from a human antibody fragment. It works by keeping new blood vessels from forming under the retina (a sensory membrane that lines the inside of the eye). detailsTwo: Eylea is used to treat wet age-related macular degeneration. It is also used to treat swelling in the retina caused by a blockage in the blood vessels.

detailsOne: Treating swelling, itching, redness, and irritation of the eyes and eyelids. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Maxidex suspension is an ophthalmic corticosteroid. It works by stopping the inflammatory response (redness, swelling, itching, warmth, pain) of the eye tissues caused by irritating or allergy-causing agents.

detailsOne: Treating swelling, itching, redness, and irritation of the eyes and eyelids. It may also be used in the ear canal to treat inflammation of the outer ear. It may also be used to treat other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Dexasol drops are a corticosteroid. It works by decreasing inflammation, which helps to relieve symptoms such as redness, swelling, itching, warmth, and pain.

detailsOne: Dexamethasone ophthalmic is in a class of drugs called corticosteroids. It inhibits processes in the body that cause inflammation. Therefore, the swelling and pain of inflammatory conditions is decreased.
detailsTwo: Dexamethasone ophthalmic is used to treat eye inflammation caused by infections, injury, surgery, or other conditions.

detailsOne: Treating an eye problem caused by diabetes (macular edema). It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.

detailsOne: Retisert is an ophthalmic implant containing fluocinolone. Fluocinolone is a steroid medicine. It prevents the release of substances in the body that cause inflammation.

detailsOne: Numbing (loss of feeling) during dental or surgical procedures, labor, or delivery. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.

detailsOne: Causing numbness during surgical procedures, labor, or delivery. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.

detailsOne: Articaine and epinephrine are anesthetics (numbing medicines). They work by blocking nerve signals in your body.

detailsOne: Relieving discomfort, itching, and burning caused by hemorrhoids.

detailsOne: Causing loss of feeling during surgical procedures, labor, and delivery, or for short-term pain management. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.

detailsOne: Inducing spinal anesthesia for certain medical or surgical procedures.

detailsOne: Tetracaine is a local anesthetic (numbing medicine). It works by blocking nerve signals in your body.

detailsOne: Coreg (carvedilol) is a beta-blocker. Beta-blockers affect the heart and circulation (blood flow through arteries and veins).
detailsTwo: Coreg is used to treat heart failure and hypertension (high blood pressure). It is also used after a heart attack that has caused your heart not to pump as well.

detailsOne: Diovan (valsartan) is an angiotensin II receptor antagonist. Valsartan keeps blood vessels from narrowing, which lowers blood pressure and improves blood flow.

(hypertension) in adults and children who are at least 6 years old. It is also used in adults to treat heart failure, and to lower the risk of death after a heart attack.

detailsOne: Metoprolol is a beta-blocker that affects the heart and circulation (blood flow through arteries and veins).
detailsTwo: Metoprolol is used to treat angina (chest pain) and hypertension (high blood pressure). It is also used to treat or prevent heart attack.

detailsOne: Toprol-XL (metoprolol) is a beta-blocker that affects the heart and circulation (blood flow through arteries and veins).

detailsOne: Treating high blood pressure, alone or with other medicines; long-term treatment of chest pain; and reducing the risk of death because of heart problems in patients who have had a heart attack. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Lopressor is a beta-adrenergic blocking agent (beta-blocker). It works by reducing the amount of work the heart has to do (reduces chest pain) and the amount of blood the heart pumps out (lowers high blood pressure). It is also used to stabilize the heart rhythm in conditions in which the heart is beating too fast or in an irregular rhythm.

detailsOne: Treating high blood pressure or certain types of heart failure. It may also be used after a heart attack to improve survival in certain patients. It may be used along with other medicines. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Coreg CR extended-release capsules are a beta-blocker. It works by relaxing the blood vessels, slowing down the heart, and decreasing the amount of blood it pumps out. This decreases blood pressure, helps the heart pump more efficiently, and reduces the workload on the heart.

detailsOne: Altace (ramipril) is an ACE inhibitor. ACE stands for angiotensin converting enzyme.
detailsTwo: Altace is used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension) or congestive heart failure, and to improve survival after a heart attack.

detailsOne: Vasotec (enalapril) is an ACE inhibitor. ACE stands for angiotensin converting enzyme.

(hypertension) in adults and children who are at least 1 month old.

detailsOne: Capoten (captopril) is an ACE inhibitor. ACE stands for angiotensin converting enzyme.

detailsOne: Treating high blood pressure alone or with other medicine. It is used along with other medicines to manage heart failure or improve survival in certain patients after a heart attack. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Mavik is an angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) inhibitor. It works by helping to relax blood vessels. This helps to lower blood pressure.

detailsOne: Monopril (fosinopril) is an ACE inhibitors. ACE stands for angiotensin converting enzyme.

detailsOne: Treating lead poisoning.

detailsOne: Treating moderate to severe rheumatoid arthritis, osteoarthritis, and ankylosing spondylitis. It is used to treat gout, certain types of bursitis and tendonitis, or mild to moderate pain. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.

detailsOne: Immune globulin intravenous (IGIV) is a sterilized solution made from human plasma. It contains the antibodies to help your body protect itself against infection from various diseases.
detailsTwo: IGIV is used to treat primary immunodeficiency (PI), and to reduce the risk of infection in individuals with poorly functioning immune systems such as those with chronic lymphocytic leukemia (CLL). IGIV is also used to increase platelets (blood clotting cells) in people with idiopathic thrombocytopenic purpura (ITP) and to prevent aneurysm caused by a weakening of the main artery in the heart associated with Kawasaki syndrome.

detailsOne: Ixiaro vaccine is used to help prevent Japanese encephalitis in adults and adolescents who are at least 17 years old.
detailsTwo: Japanese encephalitis is a serious disease caused by a virus. It is the leading cause of viral encephalitis (inflammation of the brain) in Asia. Encephalitis is an infection of the membrane around the brain and spinal cord. This infection often causes only mild symptoms, but prolonged swelling of the brain can cause permanent brain damage or death.

detailsOne: Xalatan (latanoprost) reduces pressure in the eye by increasing the amount of fluid that drains from the eye.

Travatan Z is a new formulation that eliminates benzalkonium chloride (BAK) from Alcon's existing Travatan solution and replaces BAK with SOFZIA(TM), a robust ionic buffered preservative system that is gentle to the ocular surface. Alcon developed this BAK-free version of Travatan because long-term use of topical solutions containing BAK may compromise the ocular surface and exacerbate conditions such as dry eye.

detailsOne: Combigan contains a combination of brimonidine and timolol.
detailsTwo: Timolol is a beta-blocker that also reduces pressure inside the eye.

detailsOne: Cosopt eye drops contain a combination of dorzolamide and timolol. Dorzolamide ophthalmic (for the eyes) reduces the amount of fluid in the eye, which decreases pressure inside the eye. Timolol ophthalmic is a beta-blocker that also reduces pressure inside the eye.
detailsTwo: Cosopt is used to treat certain types of glaucoma and other causes of high pressure inside the eye.

detailsOne: Lowering eye pressure in patients with open-angle glaucoma or increased pressure in the eye (ocular hypertension).

detailsOne: Preventing the rejection of organ transplants (kidney, liver, and heart). Neoral is also used to treat psoriasis and rheumatoid arthritis in certain patients. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.

detailsOne: Nplate (romiplostim) is a man-made form of a protein that increases production of platelets (blood-clotting cells) in your body.
detailsTwo: Nplate is used to prevent bleeding episodes in people with chronic immune
(ITP), a bleeding condition caused by a lack of platelets in the blood.

detailsOne: Treating certain conditions associated with decreased adrenal gland function. It is also used to treat severe inflammation due to certain conditions, including severe asthma, severe allergies, rheumatoid arthritis, ulcerative colitis, certain blood disorders, lupus, multiple sclerosis, and certain eye and skin conditions. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Decadron is a corticosteroid. It works by decreasing or preventing tissues from responding to inflammation. It also modifies the body's response to certain immune stimulation.

detailsOne: Promacta (eltrombopag) is a man-made form of a protein that increases production of platelets (blood-clotting cells) in your body. Eltrombopag can lower the risk of bleeding by increasing platelets in your blood.
detailsTwo: Promacta is used to prevent bleeding episodes in people with chronic

(ITP), a bleeding condition caused by a lack of platelets in the blood. This medicine is for use in adults and children who are at least 1 year old, after other medicines have been tried without success.

detailsOne: Preventing certain blood problems that may occur during pregnancy or blood transfusion. It may also be used to treat immune thrombocytopenic purpura (ITP).
detailsTwo: WinRho SDF is an immunoglobulin (Ig), which contains antibodies to the Rh
(D) antigen. Exactly how it works is not known.

detailsOne: Dexamethasone is a steroid that prevents the release of substances in the body that cause inflammation.
detailsTwo: Dexamethasone is used to treat many different conditions such as allergic disorders, skin conditions, ulcerative colitis, arthritis, lupus, psoriasis, or breathing disorders.

detailsOne: Preventing certain blood problems that may occur during pregnancy or blood transfusion. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: RhoGAM is an immunoglobulin (Ig), which contains antibodies to the Rho(D) antigen. Exactly how it works is unknown.

detailsOne: Gammagard (immune globulin intravenous (IGIV)) is a sterilized solution made from human plasma. It contains the antibodies to help your body protect itself against infection from various diseases.
detailsTwo: Gammagard is used to treat primary immunodeficiency (PI), and to reduce the risk of infection in individuals with poorly functioning immune systems such as those with chronic lymphocytic leukemia (CLL). Gammagard is also used to increase platelets (blood clotting cells) in people with idiopathic thrombocytopenic purpura (ITP) and to prevent aneurysm caused by a weakening of the main artery in the heart associated with Kawasaki syndrome.

detailsOne: Gamunex-C (immune globulin intravenous (IGIV)) is a sterilized solution made from human plasma. It contains the antibodies to help your body protect itself against infection from various diseases.
detailsTwo: Gamunex-C is used to treat primary immunodeficiency (PI). This includes, but is not limited to, congenital agammaglobulinemia, common variable immunodeficiency, X-linked agammaglobulinemia, Wiskott-Aldrich syndrome, and severe combined immunodeficiencies. Gamunex-C is also used to increase platelets (blood clotting cells) in people with idiopathic thrombocytopenic purpura (ITP).

detailsOne: Treating severe allergies, arthritis, asthma, multiple sclerosis, and skin conditions. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Sterapred is a corticosteroid. It works by decreasing or preventing tissues from responding to inflammation. It also modifies the body's response to certain immune stimulation.

detailsOne: Treating inflammation in a number of different disorders, such as arthritis, bursitis, or tendonitis. It may also be used to treat asthma, allergic reactions, skin problems, or chronic pain. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Kenalog-40 suspension is a corticosteroid. Exactly how it works to decrease irritation and swelling is not known, but it has a wide range of effects at the cell level. This relieves the discomfort caused by inflammation.

detailsOne: PRED-ni-sone
Privigen (immune globulin intravenous (IGIV)) is a sterilized solution made from human plasma. It contains the antibodies to help your body protect itself against infection from various diseases.
detailsTwo: Privigen is used as a replacement therapy for primary humoral immunodeficiency (PI). This includes, but is not limited to congenital agammaglobulinemia, common variable immunodeficiency (CVID), X-linked agammaglobulinemia, Wiskott-Aldrich syndrome, and severe combined immunodeficiencies.

detailsOne: Preventing the rejection of organ transplants (kidney, liver, and heart). It is used in combination with adrenal corticosteroids. It may also be used to treat chronic rejection in patients previously treated with other immunosuppressive agents. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Sandimmune is an immunosuppressant. It works by suppressing the immune system. This prevents the body from rejecting transplanted organs.

detailsOne: Immune globulin intravenous (IGIV) is a sterilized solution made from human plasma. It contains the antibodies to help your body protect itself against infection from various diseases.
detailsTwo: IGIV is used to treat primary immunodeficiency (PI), and to reduce the risk of infection in individuals with poorly functioning immune systems such as those with chronic lymphocytic leukemia (CLL). IGIV is also used to increase platelets (blood clotting cells) in people with idiopathic thrombocytopenic purpura (ITP) and to prevent aneurysm caused by a weakening of the main artery in the heart associated with Kawasaki syndrome.

detailsOne: Prednisone is a steroid. Prednisone prevents the release of substances in the body that cause inflammation. Prednisone also suppresses the immune system.
detailsTwo: Prednisone is used as an anti-inflammatory or an immunosuppressant medication. Prednisone treats many different conditions such as allergic disorders, skin conditions, ulcerative colitis, arthritis, lupus, psoriasis, or breathing disorders.

detailsOne: Treating certain children or adults when the body does not produce enough growth hormone. It is also used to treat certain children who are not growing normally because of Turner syndrome or certain other conditions (eg, idiopathic short stature, short stature homeobox-containing gene [SHOX] deficiency). It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Humatrope cartridge is a growth hormone. It works by stimulating growth in patients who do not make enough natural growth hormone.

detailsOne: Treating certain children or adults when the body does not produce enough growth hormone. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Nutropin is a growth hormone. It works by stimulating growth in patients who do not make enough natural growth hormone.

detailsOne: Treating certain children or adults whose bodies do not produce enough growth hormone. It is also used to treat certain children who are not growing normally due to Turner syndrome or Noonan syndrome. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Norditropin FlexPro is a growth hormone. It works by stimulating growth in patients who do not make enough natural growth hormone.

detailsOne: Treating certain children or adults when the body does not produce enough growth hormone. It is also used to treat certain children who are not growing normally due to Turner syndrome or other conditions (eg, chronic kidney problems, idiopathic short stature). It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Nutropin AQ is a growth hormone. It works by stimulating growth in patients who do not make enough natural growth hormone.

detailsOne: Ofev (nintedanib) is used to treat a lung disease called idiopathic

(IPF). IPF causes scar tissue to form deep within your lungs. The scar tissue thickens and becomes stiff over time, which can make it harder for your lungs to work. Decreased lung function can make it hard for you to breathe. Other medical problems can occur when your brain, heart, and other organs do not get enough oxygen.
detailsTwo: The cause of IPF is often unknown, but this condition is a progressive disease that can be fatal. Ofev is not a cure for IPF, but this medicine may slow the progress of this disease.

detailsOne: Esbriet (pirfenidone) is used to treat a lung disease called idiopathic

(IPF). IPF causes scar tissue to form deep within your lungs. The scar tissue thickens and becomes stiff or thick over time, which can make it harder for your lungs to work. Decreased lung function can make it hard for you to breathe. Other medical problems can occur when your brain, heart, and other organs do not get enough oxygen.
detailsTwo: The cause of IPF is often unknown, but this condition is a progressive disease that can be fatal. Esbriet is not a cure for IPF, but this medicine may slow the progress of this disease.

detailsOne: Reducing the number and severity of infections associated with chronic granulomatous disease. It is also used to delay the progression of severe, life-threatening bone density disease. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Actimmune is a protein identical to one found in the body. How Actimmune works is not fully understood. It is thought to enhance the action of cells the body uses in defense against certain diseases.

detailsOne: Treating supraventricular tachycardia, a rhythm disturbance of the heart. It is also used for controlling heart rate response to other rhythm disturbances, specifically atrial fibrillation and atrial flutter. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Calan is a calcium channel blocker. It works by slowing the electrical conduction in the heart, slowing heart rate, and/or normalizing heart rhythm.

detailsOne: Treating high blood pressure. It may be used alone or with other medicines. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Verelan sustained-release pellet-filled capsules are a calcium channel blocker. It works by relaxing (dilating) your blood vessels, which lowers blood pressure.

detailsOne: Treating high blood pressure. It may be used alone or with other medicines. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Calan SR long-acting tablets are a calcium channel blocker. It works by relaxing (dilating) your blood vessels, which lowers blood pressure.

detailsOne: Treating high blood pressure and chest pain. It may be used alone or with other medicines. It may also be used for certain conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Covera-HS sustained-release tablets (controlled onset) is a calcium channel blocker. It works by relaxing (dilating) your blood vessels, lowering blood pressure, and decreasing heart rate, which lowers the workload on the heart. It also dilates coronary arteries, which increases blood flow to the heart.

detailsOne: Treating high blood pressure. It may be used alone or with other medicines. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Isoptin SR long-acting tablets are a calcium channel blocker. It works by relaxing (dilating) your blood vessels, which lowers blood pressure.

detailsOne: Treating symptoms of irritable bowel syndrome. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Bentyl is an anticholinergic. It works by blocking a chemical in the smooth muscle of the stomach and intestines, causing them to relax, which reduces cramping.

detailsOne: Amitiza (lubiprostone) increases the secretion of fluid in your intestines to help make it easier to pass stools (bowel movements).
detailsTwo: Amitiza is used to treat chronic constipation, or constipation caused by opioid (narcotic) pain medicine. It may also be used to treat irritable bowel syndrome in women with constipation as the main symptom.

detailsOne: Treating high blood pressure. It may be used alone or with other medicines. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Verelan PM sustained-release capsules controlled onset is a calcium channel blocker. It works by relaxing (dilating) your blood vessels, which lowers blood pressure.

detailsOne: Treating irritable bowel syndrome and intestinal inflammation in combination with other medicines. It may also be used along with other medicines to treat intestinal ulcers. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Donnatal is an anticholinergic and barbiturate combination. It works by decreasing the motion of the muscles in the stomach and intestine and providing mild sedation.

detailsOne: Librax is a capsule containing a combination of chlordiazepoxide and clidinium. Chlordiazepoxide is a benzodiazepine that affects chemicals in the brain that may be unbalanced. Clidinium reduces stomach acid and decreases intestinal spasms.
detailsTwo: Librax is a medicine that may be effective in treating
, or symptoms related to intestinal infection. Librax is given together with other medications to treat these conditions.

detailsOne: Treating certain stomach or bowel problems (eg, ulcers, spasms or cramping, irritable bowel syndrome, symptoms of colic), certain bladder problems (eg, spastic bladder, cystitis), and excessive secretions caused by inflammation of the pancreas, and for aiding in certain medical procedures or surgery. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Levsin is an anticholinergic agent. It works by decreasing the motion of the stomach and intestines and the secretion of stomach fluids, including acid.

detailsOne: Treating schizophrenia. It is also used to control symptoms associated with Tourette disorder. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Haldol is an antipsychotic agent. Exactly how it works is not known, but it may work by blocking certain chemicals in the brain.

detailsOne: Lotronex (alosetron) blocks the action of a chemical called serotonin in the intestines. This slows the movement of stools (bowel movements) through the intestines.
detailsTwo: Lotronex is used to treat severe, chronic

(IBS) in women who have had diarrhea as the main symptom for at least 6 months. Alosetron should be used only by women who have tried other IBS treatments without success. Alosetron not been shown to be effective in men with IBS.

detailsOne: Ativan (lorazepam) belongs to a group of drugs called benzodiazepines. Lorazepam affects chemicals in the brain that may be unbalanced in people with anxiety.
detailsTwo: Ativan is used to treat
disorders.

detailsOne: Treating certain stomach, intestinal, and bladder conditions, including spasms. It is used to control stomach secretions and cramps. It is used to relieve the symptoms of colic, runny nose, and Parkinson-like problems. It is used to treat excessive sweating or saliva production. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Levsin/SL is an anticholinergic agent. It works by decreasing the motion of muscles in the stomach, intestines, and bladder. It also decreases the production of stomach acid.

detailsOne: Midazolam is a benzodiazepine (ben-zoe-dye-AZE-eh-peen) sedative.
detailsTwo: Midazolam is used to sedate a person who is having a minor surgery, dental work, or other medical procedure.

detailsOne: Treating certain stomach, intestinal, and bladder conditions, including spasms. It is used to control stomach secretions and cramps. It is used to relieve the symptoms of colic, runny nose, and Parkinson-like problems. It is used to treat excessive sweating or saliva production. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Levbid extended-release tablets are an anticholinergic agent. It works by decreasing the motion of muscles in the stomach, intestines, and bladder. It also decreases the production of stomach acid.

detailsOne: Valium (diazepam) is a benzodiazepine (ben-zoe-dye-AZE-eh-peens). Diazepam affects chemicals in the brain that may be unbalanced in people with anxiety.
detailsTwo: Valium is used to treat
disorders,
symptoms, or muscle spasms.

detailsOne: Linzess (linaclotide) works by increasing the secretion of chloride and water in the intestines, which can soften stools and stimulate bowel movements.
detailsTwo: Linzess is a prescription medicine used to treat chronic
, or chronic
(IBS) in adults who have had constipation as the main symptom. The safety and effectiveness of Linzess has not been established in patients under 18 years of age.

detailsOne: Treating certain stomach, intestinal, and bladder conditions, including spasms. It is used to control stomach secretions and cramps. It is used to relieve the symptoms of colic, runny nose, and Parkinson-like problems. It is used to treat excessive sweating or saliva production. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Anaspaz is an anticholinergic agent. It works by decreasing the motion of muscles in the stomach, intestines, and bladder. It also decreases the production of stomach acid.

detailsOne: AT-roe-peen SUL-fate, hye-oh-SYE-a-meen SUL-fate, fee-noe-BAR-bi-tal, skoe-POL-a-meen hye-droe-BROE-mide
Cholestyramine helps reduce cholesterol (fatty acids) in the blood. High cholesterol is associated with an increased risk of heart disease and atherosclerosis (clogged arteries).
detailsTwo: Cholestyramine is used to lower high levels of cholesterol in the blood, especially low-density lipoprotein (LDL) ("bad" cholesterol).

detailsOne: lor-AZ-e-pam
Long-term treatment of schizophrenia. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Haldol Decanoate is an antipsychotic agent. Exactly how it works is not known, but it may work by blocking certain chemicals in the brain.

detailsOne: Treating occasional constipation and restoring regularity. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Konsyl powder is a fiber laxative. It works by absorbing water and swelling in the intestines. This helps the stool form the bulk necessary to be easily passed.

detailsOne: Treating occasional constipation and restoring regularity. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Metamucil is a fiber laxative. It works by absorbing water and swelling in the intestines. This helps the stool form the bulk necessary to be easily passed.

detailsOne: Treating anxiety disorders or for the short-term relief of the symptoms of anxiety. It is also used to relieve certain types of muscle spasms and to treat symptoms of alcohol withdrawal (eg, agitation, tremor, hallucinations). Diazepam Intensol concentrate is also used with other medicines to treat certain types of seizure disorders. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Diazepam Intensol concentrate is a benzodiazepine. It works by increasing the action of a certain chemical (gamma-aminobutyric acid [GABA]) in the brain and nervous system. This helps to reduce anxiety. It also helps to reduce seizure activity in the brain and to reduce muscle spasms.

detailsOne: Treating episodes of increased seizure activity (cluster seizures) in certain patients with epilepsy who already take other seizure medicines.
detailsTwo: Diastat gel is a benzodiazepine. It works in the brain to decrease seizures.

detailsOne: Lowering blood cholesterol levels. It is used along with changes in diet. It is also used to relieve itching caused by partial biliary obstruction. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Questran powder is a bile acid sequestrant. It works by increasing the removal of bile acids from the body. As the body loses bile acids, it replaces them by converting cholesterol from the blood to bile acids. This causes the blood level of cholesterol to decrease.

detailsOne: Diazepam is a benzodiazepine (ben-zoe-dye-AZE-eh-peen). Diazepam affects chemicals in the brain that may be unbalanced in people with seizures.
detailsTwo: Diazepam rectal (for use in the rectum) is used to treat occasionally increased seizures (cluster seizures) in people with epilepsy who also routinely take other anti-convulsants. Diazepam rectal is not for long-term daily use to prevent seizures.

detailsOne: Treating certain stomach, intestinal, and bladder conditions, including spasms. It is used to control stomach secretions and cramps. It is used to relieve the symptoms of colic, runny nose, and Parkinson-like problems. It is used to treat excessive sweating or saliva production. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: HyoMax is an anticholinergic agent. It works by decreasing the motion of muscles in the stomach, intestines, and bladder. It also decreases the production of stomach acid.

detailsOne: Treating episodes of increased seizure activity (cluster seizures) in certain patients with epilepsy who already take other seizure medicines.
detailsTwo: Diastat AcuDial gel is a benzodiazepine. It works in the brain to decrease seizures.

detailsOne: Treating mild to moderate Crohn disease and maintaining remission for up to 3 months. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Entocort EC sustained-release capsules are a corticosteroid. It works by decreasing inflammation.

in patients 5 years of age and older.

Preventing kidney transplant rejection when used along with other medicines. It may also be used to reduce signs and symptoms of active rheumatoid arthritis. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Imuran is an antimetabolite. It works by decreasing the effects of certain cells in the body's immune system.

detailsOne: Treating ulcerative colitis. It is also used to increase the time between attacks of ulcerative colitis. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Azulfidine is a salicylate. It decreases inflammation. Exactly how it works to treat ulcerative colitis is not known.

detailsOne: Treating moderately active ulcerative colitis (inflammation of the colon). Asacol HD delayed-release tablets may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Asacol HD delayed-release tablets are a 5-aminosalicylic acid (5-ASA). It works by preventing the production of substances that cause inflammation of the colon.

detailsOne: Treating various forms of mild to moderate inflammation of the colon.
detailsTwo: Canasa suppositories are a 5-aminosalicylic acid (5-ASA). It works by preventing the production of substances that cause the inflammation of the colon.

detailsOne: Treating certain conditions associated with decreased adrenal gland function. It is also used to treat severe inflammation due to certain conditions, including severe asthma, severe allergies, rheumatoid arthritis, ulcerative colitis, certain blood disorders, lupus, multiple sclerosis, and certain eye and skin conditions. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Decadron is a corticosteroid. It works by decreasing or preventing tissues from responding to inflammation. It also modifies the body's response to certain immune stimulation.

detailsOne: Dexamethasone is a steroid that prevents the release of substances in the body that cause inflammation.
detailsTwo: Dexamethasone is used to treat many different conditions such as allergic disorders, skin conditions, ulcerative colitis, arthritis, lupus, psoriasis, or breathing disorders.

detailsOne: Treating mastocytosis, including improvement of symptoms such as diarrhea, flushing, headaches, vomiting, hives, stomach pain, nausea, and itching in some patients. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Gastrocrom concentrate is a mast cell stabilizer. It works by preventing the mast cells of the body from releasing substances that cause symptoms of mastocytosis.

detailsOne: me-SAL-a-meen
Treating severe allergies, arthritis, asthma, multiple sclerosis, and skin conditions. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Cortef is a corticosteroid. It works by decreasing or preventing tissues from responding to inflammation. It also modifies the body's response to certain immune stimulation.

detailsOne: Synthroid (levothyroxine) is a replacement for a hormone normally produced by your thyroid gland to regulate the body's energy and metabolism. Levothyroxine is given when the thyroid does not produce enough of this hormone on its own.
detailsTwo: Synthroid treats hypothyroidism (low thyroid hormone). Synthroid is also used to treat or prevent goiter (enlarged thyroid gland), which can be caused by hormone imbalances, radiation treatment, surgery, or cancer.

detailsOne: Levoxyl (levothyroxine) is a replacement for a hormone normally produced by your thyroid gland to regulate the body's energy and metabolism. Levothyroxine is given when the thyroid does not produce enough of this hormone on its own.
detailsTwo: Levoxyl treats hypothyroidism (low thyroid hormone). Levoxyl is also used to treat or prevent goiter (enlarged thyroid gland), which can be caused by hormone imbalances, radiation treatment, surgery, or cancer.

detailsOne: Treating underactive thyroid. It is also used to treat or prevent certain types of goiters and to manage thyroid cancer. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Armour Thyroid is a thyroid hormone. It works by replacing thyroid hormone when your body does not make enough on its own.

detailsOne: Desiccated (dried) thyroid is a combination of hormones that are normally produced by your thyroid gland to regulate the body's energy and metabolism. Desiccated thyroid is given when the thyroid does not produce enough of this hormone on its own.
detailsTwo: Desiccated thyroid treats hypothyroidism (low thyroid hormone). Desiccated thyroid is also used to treat or prevent goiter (enlarged thyroid gland), and is also given as part of a medical tests for thyroid disorders.

detailsOne: Treating low thyroid function. It is also used to treat or prevent different types of goiters, as an aid to diagnose certain thyroid conditions, or to treat patients who are allergic to other thyroid medicines. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Cytomel is a thyroid hormone. It works by replacing or supplementing the natural thyroid hormones in the body.

detailsTwo: Levothyroxine treats hypothyroidism (low thyroid hormone). Levothyroxine is also used to treat or prevent goiter (enlarged thyroid gland), which can be caused by hormone imbalances, radiation treatment, surgery, or cancer.

detailsOne: Treating low thyroid hormone levels and certain types of goiters. It is also used with surgery and other medicines for managing certain types of thyroid cancer. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Tirosint is a thyroid hormone. It works by replacing thyroid hormone when your body does not make enough on its own.

detailsOne: Treating low blood pressure. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Levophed is a peripheral vasoconstrictor and an inotropic stimulator. It works by making the blood vessels narrower, which increases blood pressure. It also helps the heart work better.

detailsOne: Treating dizziness that occurs upon sitting up or standing (orthostatic hypotension).
detailsTwo: Orvaten is an alpha-agonist. It works by causing blood vessels to constrict (become smaller), which helps to increase blood pressure.

detailsOne: Norepinephrine is identical to the endogenous catecholamine that is synthesized in the adrenal medulla and in sympathetic nervous tissue; norepinephrine predominantly acts by a direct effect on α-adrenergic receptors.
detailsTwo: Used as adjunctive therapy to produce vasoconstriction and maintain BP in the management of certain acute hypotensive states (e.g., pheochromocytomectomy, sympathectomy, poliomyelitis, spinal anesthesia, MI, septicemia, blood transfusion, drug reactions).

detailsOne: Northera (droxidopa) works by constricting (narrowing) the blood vessels and increasing blood pressure.
detailsTwo: Northera is used to treat

that causes severe dizziness or a light-headed feeling, like you might pass out. This medicine is for use in people with conditions of the nervous system that can cause low blood pressure (such as Parkinson's disease, multiple system atrophy, autonomic failure, and others).

detailsOne: Maintaining blood pressure in certain acute low blood pressure situations. It is also used to treat blood vessel failure during shock and low blood pressure or allergic reactions caused by other medications. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Vazculep is a vasopressor. It works by constricting blood vessels and raising blood pressure.

detailsOne: Treating bleeding problems caused by low vitamin K blood levels or decreased vitamin K activity (eg, caused by certain anticoagulants, antibiotics, salicylates, certain liver problems).
detailsTwo: Mephyton is a vitamin K. It works by helping the liver to produce blood clotting factors.

detailsOne: Albumin is a protein produced by the liver that circulates in plasma (the clear liquid portion of your blood). Medicinal albumin is made of plasma proteins from human blood. This medicine works by increasing plasma volume or levels of albumin in the blood.
detailsTwo: Albumin is used to replace blood volume loss resulting from trauma such as a severe burns or an injury that causes blood loss. This medicine is also used to treat low albumin levels caused by surgery, dialysis, abdominal infections, liver failure, pancreatitis, respiratory distress, bypass surgery, ovarian problems caused by fertility drugs, and other many other conditions.

detailsTwo: Albutein is a concentrate of plasma proteins from human blood. It works by increasing plasma volume or serum albumin levels.

detailsOne: Treating certain children or adults when the body does not produce enough growth hormone. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Genotropin is a growth hormone. It works by stimulating growth in patients who do not make enough natural growth hormone.

detailsOne: Phosphorus is a naturally occurring substance that is important in every cell in the body. The majority of phosphorus in the body is found in the bones. The potassium and sodium salt forms of phosphorus are called phosphates.
detailsTwo: Potassium phosphate and sodium phosphate is a combination medicine used to make the urine more acid to help prevent kidney stones.

detailsOne: Preventing kidney stones. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Neutra-Phos-K powder for solution is a urinary acidifier. It works by increasing the amount of acid in the urine, which lowers the pH of the urine. This may reduce the growth of some bacteria in the urine and help dissolve calcium kidney stones.

detailsOne: Treating low parathyroid hormone levels, rickets (a vitamin D deficiency condition), and low phosphate levels in the body. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Drisdol is a form of vitamin D. It works by promoting proper absorption and use of calcium and phosphate in the body and helping to regulate parathyroid hormone levels.

detailsTwo: Ergocalciferol is used to treat hypoparathyroidism (decreased functioning of the parathyroid glands).

detailsTwo: Calciferol solution is a vitamin. It works by increasing vitamin D levels in the body.

detailsOne: Strensiq (asfotase alfa) is an enzyme replacement medicine that is used to treat hypophosphatasia (HYE-poe-FOS-fa-TAY-zha).
detailsTwo: Hypophosphatasia is a rare genetic disorder in which there is a deficiency of an enzyme that helps the body process calcium and phosphorus. This leads to abnormal growth and development of the bones and teeth, including soft or brittle bones, growth problems, and tooth loss.

detailsOne: Managing certain conditions caused by high or low parathyroid hormone levels. It is used to manage low blood calcium levels in patients who are on chronic kidney dialysis. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Rocaltrol is a form of vitamin D. It works by promoting proper absorption and use of calcium and phosphate by the body in normal bone development and maintenance.

detailsOne: Treating low parathyroid hormone levels, rickets (a vitamin D deficiency condition), and low phosphate levels in the body. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.

detailsOne: Natpara (parathyroid hormone) is a manmade form of a hormone that occurs naturally in the body.
detailsTwo: Natpara is used together with calcium and vitamin D to treat hypocalcemia (low levels of calcium in the blood) in people who also have low levels of parathyroid hormone.

detailsOne: Treating or preventing low vitamin D levels. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Calciferol solution is a vitamin. It works by increasing vitamin D levels in the body.

detailsOne: Calcium is a mineral that is found naturally in foods. Calcium is necessary for many normal functions of the body, especially bone formation and maintenance. Calcium can also bind to other minerals (such as phosphate) and aid in their removal from the body.
detailsTwo: Calcium phosphate is used to prevent and to treat calcium deficiencies.

detailsOne: Calcium is a mineral that is found naturally in foods. Calcium is necessary for many normal functions of your body, especially bone formation and maintenance. Calcium can also bind to other minerals (such as phosphate) and aid in their removal from the body.
detailsTwo: Calcium lactate is used to prevent and to treat calcium deficiencies.

detailsOne: Depakote (divalproex sodium) affects chemicals in the body that may be involved in causing seizures.
detailsTwo: Depakote is used to treat various types of seizure disorders. It is sometimes used together with other seizure medications.

detailsOne: Samsca (tolvaptan) reduces the level of a hormone that regulates the balance of water and salt (sodium) in the body. High levels of this hormone can cause an imbalance that results in low sodium levels and fluid retention.
detailsTwo: Samsca is used to treat hyponatremia (low levels of sodium in your blood) in people with heart failure, and certain hormonal imbalances. Tolvaptan improves urine flow without causing the body to lose too much sodium as you urinate.

detailsOne: Controlling certain types of seizures in the treatment of epilepsy. It is also used to treat the manic phase of bipolar disorder (manic-depressive illness) and prevent migraine headaches. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Depakote ER extended-release tablets are an anticonvulsant. It works by reducing or preventing the number of seizures by controlling the abnormal activity of nerve impulses in the brain and central nervous system. Exactly how it works to treat bipolar disorder and migraine headache is not known.

detailsOne: Risperdal (risperidone) is an antipsychotic medicine. It works by changing the effects of chemicals in the brain.
detailsTwo: Risperdal is used to treat
and symptoms of
(manic depression). Risperdal is also used in autistic children to treat symptoms of irritability.

detailsOne: Treating schizophrenia. It is also used to control symptoms associated with Tourette disorder. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Haldol is an antipsychotic agent. Exactly how it works is not known, but it may work by blocking certain chemicals in the brain.

detailsOne: Treating certain mental or mood disorders (eg, schizophrenia), the manic phase of manic-depressive disorder, anxiety and restlessness before surgery, the blood disease porphyria, severe behavioral and conduct disorders in children, nausea and vomiting, and severe hiccups. It is also used with other medicines to treat symptoms associated with tetanus. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Thorazine is a phenothiazine. The exact way Thorazine works is not known.

detailsOne: Treating manic episodes in patients with bipolar disorder. It is also used to reduce the frequency and decrease the severity of manic episodes in patients with bipolar disorder. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Lithobid controlled-release and extended-release tablets are an antimanic agent. Exactly how Lithobid controlled-release and extended-release tablets works is unknown, but it may work by altering the balance of certain chemicals in the brain.

detailsOne: Stavzor (valproic acid) affects chemicals in the body that may be involved in causing seizures.
detailsTwo: Stavzor is used to treat various types of seizure disorders. It is sometimes used together with other seizure medications.

detailsOne: Long-term treatment of schizophrenia. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Haldol Decanoate is an antipsychotic agent. Exactly how it works is not known, but it may work by blocking certain chemicals in the brain.

detailsOne: Divalproex sodium affects chemicals in the body that may be involved in causing seizures.
detailsTwo: Divalproex sodium is used to treat various types of seizure disorders. Divalproex sodium is sometimes used together with other seizure medications.

detailsOne: Velphoro (sucroferric oxyhydroxide) is a phosphate binder that helps prevent hypocalcemia (low levels of calcium in the blood) caused by elevated phosphorus.
detailsTwo: Velphoro is used to control phosphorus levels in people with chronic kidney disease who are on dialysis.

detailsOne: Ferric citrate contains iron that binds to the phosphates you take in through food, which helps your body absorb fewer phosphates. This can lower the amount of phosphorus (a mineral) in your blood.
detailsTwo: Ferric citrate is used to control phosphorus levels in people with chronic kidney disease who are on dialysis.

detailsOne: Reducing phosphate levels in late-stage kidney failure.
detailsTwo: PhosLo is a phosphate binder. It works by preventing phosphate in the stomach and intestines from being absorbed into the body.

detailsOne: Calcium is a mineral that is needed for many functions of the body, especially bone formation and maintenance. Calcium can also bind to other minerals such as phosphate, and aid in their removal from the body.
detailsTwo: Calcium acetate is used to control phosphate levels to keep them from getting too high in people with kidney failure.

detailsOne: Calcium is a mineral that is needed for many functions of the body, especially bone formation and maintenance. Calcium can also bind to other minerals such as phosphate, and aid in their removal from the body.
detailsTwo: Calcium acetate is used to control phosphate levels to keep them from getting too high in people with kidney failure.

detailsOne: Reducing phosphate levels in late-stage kidney failure.
detailsTwo: Phoslyra solution is a phosphate binder. It works by preventing phosphate in the stomach and intestines from being absorbed into the body.

detailsOne: Calcium is a mineral that is needed for many functions of the body, especially bone formation and maintenance. Calcium can also bind to other minerals such as phosphate, and aid in their removal from the body.
detailsTwo: Calcium acetate is used to control phosphate levels to keep them from getting too high in people with kidney failure.

detailsOne: Aluminum is a naturally occurring mineral. Aluminum hydroxide is an antacid.
detailsTwo: Aluminum hydroxide is used to treat symptoms of increased stomach acid, such as heartburn, upset stomach, sour stomach, or acid indigestion. Aluminum hydroxide is also used to reduce phosphate levels in people with certain kidney conditions.

detailsOne: TriCor (fenofibrate) helps reduce cholesterol and triglycerides (fatty acids) in the blood. High levels of these types of fat in the blood are associated with an increased risk of atherosclerosis (clogged arteries).
detailsTwo: TriCor is used to treat high cholesterol and high triglyceride levels.

detailsOne: Lipitor (atorvastatin) belongs to a group of drugs called HMG CoA reductase inhibitors, or "statins." Atorvastatin reduces levels of "bad" cholesterol (low-density lipoprotein, or LDL) and triglycerides in the blood, while increasing levels of "good" cholesterol (high-density lipoprotein, or HDL).
detailsTwo: Lipitor is used to treat
, and to lower the risk of stroke, heart attack, or other heart complications in people with type 2 diabetes, coronary heart disease, or other risk factors.

detailsOne: Crestor (rosuvastatin) belongs to a a group of drugs called HMG CoA reductase inhibitors, or "statins." Rosuvastatin reduces levels of "bad" cholesterol (low-density lipoprotein, or LDL) and triglycerides in the blood, while increasing levels of "good" cholesterol (high-density lipoprotein, or HDL).
detailsTwo: Crestor is used in adults and children who are at least 8 years old to lower
and triglycerides (types of fat) in the blood and to slow the build-up of plaque (fatty deposits) in your blood vessels.

detailsOne: Niaspan ER extended release works by reducing LDL ("bad") cholesterol and triglycerides and increasing HDL ("good") cholesterol. Niaspan contains niacin, also called nicotinic acid, a B vitamin (vitamin B3). It occurs naturally in plants and animals and is present in many multiple vitamin supplements.
detailsTwo: Niaspan ER is used to lower cholesterol and triglycerides (types of fat) in the blood. It is also used to lower the risk of heart attack in people with high cholesterol who have already had a heart attack. It is sometimes used to treat coronary artery disease (also called atherosclerosis).

detailsOne: Pravachol (pravastatin) belongs to a group of drugs called HMG CoA reductase inhibitors, or "statins." Pravastatin reduces levels of "bad" cholesterol (low-density lipoprotein, or LDL) and triglycerides in the blood, while increasing levels of "good" cholesterol (high-density lipoprotein, or HDL).
detailsTwo: Pravachol is used to lower
and triglycerides (types of fat) in the blood.

detailsOne: Zocor (simvastatin) belongs to a group of drugs called HMG CoA reductase inhibitors, or "statins." Simvastatin reduces levels of "bad" cholesterol (low-density lipoprotein, or LDL) and triglycerides in the blood, while increasing levels of "good" cholesterol (high-density lipoprotein, or HDL).
detailsTwo: Zocor is used to lower
and triglycerides (types of fat) in the blood.

detailsOne: Lowering blood cholesterol levels. It is used along with changes in diet.
detailsTwo: Colestid is a bile acid sequestrant. It works in the bowel to help remove bile acids from the body. The body then uses cholesterol to make more bile acids. This causes blood cholesterol levels to decrease.

detailsOne: Treating high blood cholesterol and triglycerides. It is used along with an appropriate diet.
detailsTwo: Lopid is an antihyperlipidemic agent. It works by lowering the blood levels of triglycerides and low-density lipoprotein (LDL) ("bad") cholesterol by reducing their production by the liver. It also increases blood levels of high-density lipoprotein (HDL) ("good") cholesterol.

detailsOne: Reducing high cholesterol levels. It is used along with diet and exercise. It may be used alone or with other medicines. It is also used along with diet and exercise to control blood sugar in patients with type 2 diabetes. It should not be used to treat type 1 diabetes or diabetic ketoacidosis.
detailsTwo: Welchol is a bile acid sequestrant. It works in the bowel to help remove bile acids from the body. The body then uses cholesterol to make more bile acids, which causes blood cholesterol levels to decrease. Exactly how Welchol works to treat type 2 diabetes is not known.

detailsOne: Lowering high cholesterol and triglyceride levels in the blood. It also increases high-density lipoprotein (HDL) ("good") cholesterol levels. It is used along with an appropriate diet.
detailsTwo: Antara is a lipid-lowering agent. It works by increasing a certain substance that helps to remove triglycerides from the blood. This also helps the body to decrease the amount of other bad cholesterol in the blood.

detailsOne: Lowering high cholesterol and triglyceride levels in the blood. It also increases high-density lipoprotein (HDL) ("good") cholesterol levels. It is used along with an appropriate diet.
detailsTwo: Lipofen is a lipid-lowering agent. It works by increasing a certain substance that helps to remove triglycerides from the blood. This also helps the body to decrease the amount of other bad cholesterol in the blood.

detailsOne: Fenofibrate helps reduce cholesterol and triglycerides (fatty acids) in the blood. High levels of these types of fat in the blood are associated with an increased risk of atherosclerosis (clogged arteries).
detailsTwo: Fenofibrate may also be used for purposes not listed in this medication guide.

detailsOne: Fenofibrate helps reduce cholesterol and triglycerides (fatty acids) in the blood. High levels of these types of fat in the blood are associated with an increased risk of atherosclerosis (clogged arteries).
detailsTwo: Fenofibrate may also be used for purposes not listed in this medication guide.

detailsOne: Lowering blood cholesterol levels. It is used along with changes in diet. It is also used to relieve itching caused by partial biliary obstruction. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Prevalite powder is a bile acid sequestrant. It works by increasing the removal of bile acids from the body. As the body loses bile acids, it replaces them by converting cholesterol from the blood to bile acids. This causes the blood level of cholesterol to decrease.

detailsOne: Lowering high cholesterol in certain patients. It is used along with an appropriate diet. It is used in certain patients to reduce the risk of heart attack and chest pain caused by angina. It is also used to slow blood vessel blockage and to reduce the need for medical procedures to open blocked heart blood vessels. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Mevacor is an HMG-CoA reductase inhibitor, also known as a "statin." It works by reducing the production of certain fatty substances in the body, including cholesterol.

detailsOne: Carbonic anhydrase inhibitor;
sulfonamide derivative.
detailsTwo: Management of primary hyperkalemic periodic paralysis, primary hypokalemic periodic paralysis, and related variants.
Designated an orphan drug by FDA for such use.

detailsOne: Treating high potassium levels in the blood.
detailsTwo: Kayexalate powder is a potassium-removing resin. It works by drawing potassium into the large intestine and then removing it from the body.

detailsOne: Treating high potassium levels in the blood.
detailsTwo: Kionex powder is a potassium-removing resin. It works by drawing potassium into the large intestine and then removing it from the body.

detailsOne: SOE-dee-um bye-KAR-bo-nate
Sodium polystyrene sulfonate affects the exchange of sodium and potassium in the body.
detailsTwo: Sodium polystyrene sulfonate is used to treat high levels of potassium in the blood, also called hyperkalemia.

detailsOne: Treating diabetes mellitus.
detailsTwo: Humulin R is a fast-acting form of the hormone insulin. It works by helping your body to use sugar properly. This lowers the amount of glucose in the blood, which helps to treat diabetes.

detailsOne: Treating diabetes mellitus.
detailsTwo: Novolin R is a fast-acting form of the hormone insulin. It works by helping your body to use sugar properly. This lowers the amount of glucose in the blood, which helps to treat diabetes.

detailsOne: Veltassa (patiromer) is a medicine that binds itself to potassium in your digestive tract. This helps prevent your body from absorbing too much potassium. Patiromer also helps your body get rid of excess potassium through your stools (bowel movements).
detailsTwo: Veltassa is used to treat hyperkalemia (high levels of potassium in your blood).

detailsOne: Dietary management of low plasma or low red blood cell folate in certain patients. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Deplin is a medical food. It works by providing the body with folate.

detailsOne: Managing hyperhomocysteinemia and supplementing the diet. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Foltx is a vitamin combination. It provides nutritional supplementation for certain nutritional requirements.

detailsOne: A dietary supplement to help maintain a normal blood level of homocysteine or provide vitamins for those who do not receive the proper amount from their diet. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Folic Acid XTRA is a vitamin and folic acid combination. It works by providing vitamins and folic acid to the body to help meet nutritional requirements.

detailsOne: Disclaimer: This drug has not been found by FDA to be safe and effective, and this labeling has not been approved by FDA.

A dietary supplement for certain patients with high blood levels of homocysteine or kidney failure, or those who are on dialysis or do not receive the proper amount of vitamins from their diet. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Folbee Plus is a vitamin and folic acid combination. It works by providing vitamins and folic acid to the body to help meet nutritional requirements.

detailsOne: Supplementing the diet to treat or prevent vitamin deficiency. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Foltrate is a vitamin combination. It works by increasing the amounts of folic acid and cyanocobalamin (vitamin B
) in the body.

detailsOne: A dietary supplement for certain patients with kidney failure, or those who are on dialysis or do not receive the proper amount of vitamins from their diet. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Nephrocaps QT quick dissolve tablets are a vitamin and folic acid combination. It works by providing vitamins and folic acid to the body to help meet nutritional requirements.

detailsOne: Supplementing the diet to treat or prevent vitamin deficiency. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Folcaps is a vitamin combination. It works by increasing the amounts of folic acid and vitamin B6 and B12 in the body.

detailsOne: Dietary management of low plasma or low red blood cell folate in certain patients. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: DuLeek-Dp is a medical food. It works by providing the body with folate.

detailsOne: Gleevec (imatinib) interferes with the growth of some cancer cells.
detailsTwo: Gleevec is used to treat certain types of
(blood cancer), bone marrow disorders, and
, or certain tumors of the stomach and digestive system.

detailsOne: Disclaimer: This drug has not been found by FDA to be safe and effective, and this labeling has not been approved by FDA.
Sensipar (cinacalcet) decreases levels of parathyroid hormone (PTH), calcium, and phosphorous in the body.
detailsTwo: Sensipar is used to treat
(overactive functioning of the parathyroid glands) in people who are on long-term dialysis for kidney disease.

detailsOne: Zometa (zoledronic acid) belongs to a group of medicines called bisphosphonates (bis FOS fo nayts). Zoledronic acid inhibits the release of calcium from bones.
detailsTwo: Zometa is used to treat high blood levels of calcium caused by cancer (hypercalcemia of malignancy). Zometa also treats
(a type of bone marrow cancer) or bone cancer that has spread from elsewhere in the body.

detailsOne: Xgeva (denosumab) is a monoclonal antibody. Monoclonal antibodies are made to target and destroy only certain cells in the body. This may help to protect healthy cells from damage.
detailsTwo: Xgeva is used to prevent bone fractures and other skeletal conditions in people with tumors that have spread to the bone. It is not for use in people with multiple myeloma (bone marrow cancer).

detailsOne: Treating high calcium levels in the blood due to cancer. It is also used to treat Paget disease of the bone and bone tumors caused by certain cancers. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Aredia is a bisphosphonate. It works by reducing normal and abnormal bone loss, which helps to maintain bone strength. This also helps to reduce the amount of calcium in the blood in situations in which the levels of blood calcium may be too high.

detailsOne: Aclasta contains zoledronic acid (sometimes called zoledronate). It belongs to a group of medicines called bisphosphonates. Zoledronic acid inhibits the release of calcium from bones.
detailsTwo: Aclasta is used to treats Paget's disease and osteoporosis in postmenopausal women.

detailsOne: Dexamethasone is a steroid that prevents the release of substances in the body that cause inflammation.
detailsTwo: Dexamethasone is used to treat many different conditions such as allergic disorders, skin conditions, ulcerative colitis, arthritis, lupus, psoriasis, or breathing disorders.

detailsOne: Didronel (etidronate) belongs to a group of medicines called bisphosphonates (bis FOS fo nayts). It alters the cycle of bone formation and breakdown in the body.
detailsTwo: Didronel is used to treat
, and to treat conditions of irregular bone growth due to hip fracture or spinal cord injury.

detailsOne: Reclast (zoledronic acid - sometimes called zoledronate) is in a group of medicines called bisphosphonates (bis FOS fo nayts). Zoledronic acid inhibits the release of calcium from bones.
detailsTwo: Reclast is used to treat Paget's disease, and to treat or prevent
in postmenopausal women or people who take certain steroid medicines. Reclast is also used to increase bone mass in men with osteoporosis.

detailsOne: Treating certain conditions associated with decreased adrenal gland function. It is also used to treat severe inflammation due to certain conditions, including severe asthma, severe allergies, rheumatoid arthritis, ulcerative colitis, certain blood disorders, lupus, multiple sclerosis, and certain eye and skin conditions. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Decadron is a corticosteroid. It works by decreasing or preventing tissues from responding to inflammation. It also modifies the body's response to certain immune stimulation.

detailsOne: PRED-ni-sone
Dexamethasone is a steroid that prevents the release of substances in the body that cause inflammation.
detailsTwo: Dexamethasone is used to treat many different conditions such as allergic disorders, skin conditions, ulcerative colitis, arthritis, lupus, psoriasis, or breathing disorders.

detailsOne: Prednisone is a steroid. Prednisone prevents the release of substances in the body that cause inflammation. Prednisone also suppresses the immune system.
detailsTwo: Prednisone is used as an anti-inflammatory or an immunosuppressant medication. Prednisone treats many different conditions such as allergic disorders, skin conditions, ulcerative colitis, arthritis, lupus, psoriasis, or breathing disorders.

detailsOne: Treating severe allergies, arthritis, asthma, multiple sclerosis, and skin conditions. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Sterapred is a corticosteroid. It works by decreasing or preventing tissues from responding to inflammation. It also modifies the body's response to certain immune stimulation.

detailsOne: Lasix (furosemide) is a loop diuretic (water pill) that prevents your body from absorbing too much salt. This allows the salt to instead be passed in your urine.
detailsTwo: Lasix is used to treat fluid retention (
) in people with
, liver disease, or a kidney disorder such as nephrotic syndrome.

detailsTwo: Miacalcin nasal spray is used to treat
in women who have been in
