detailsOne: Some commonly used brand names are:
Treating certain worm infections (eg, schistosoma, liver flukes).
detailsTwo: Biltricide is an anthelmintic agent. It works by killing sensitive worms.

detailsOne: Carbaglu (carglumic acid) is a man-made form of an enzyme that occurs naturally in the liver. This enzyme is necessary for processing excess nitrogen produced when the body metabolizes proteins. Without this enzyme, nitrogen builds up in the form of ammonia and is not removed from the body. Ammonia is very toxic when it circulates in blood and tissues and can cause permanent brain damage, coma, or death.
detailsTwo: Carbaglu is used to treat hyperammonemia (HYE-per-AM-moe-NEE-mee-a), a urea cycle disorder caused by lack of a certain liver enzyme. Carbaglu is usually given with other medications to treat this lifelong disorder.

detailsOne: Treating certain parasitic infections of the intestine.
detailsTwo: Alinia is an antiparasitic agent. It works by interfering with the production of certain substances that are needed by the parasite to live.

detailsOne: Treating amoeba infection in the intestines. It is also used in combination with other medicines to manage a serious complication of liver disease (hepatic coma). It may be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Humatin is an antibacterial agent. It works by killing sensitive bacteria.

detailsOne: Paromomycin is an antibiotic that fights bacteria.
detailsTwo: Paromomycin is used to treat certain intestinal infections. Paromomycin is also used to treat certain liver problems.

detailsOne: Acetazolamide reduces the activity of a protein in your body called carbonic anhydrase. Blocking this protein can help reduce the build-up of certain fluids in the body.
detailsTwo: Acetazolamide is used in people with certain types of glaucoma to reduce the amount of fluid in the eye, which decreases pressure inside the eye.

detailsOne: Treating certain types of glaucoma in combination with other medicines. It is also used to treat or prevent symptoms of mountain sickness. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Diamox Sequels sustained-release capsules are a carbonic anhydrase inhibitor. It reduces fluid pressure in the eyeball by decreasing fluid formation in the eyeball.

detailsOne: Treating certain tapeworm infections.
detailsTwo: Albenza is an anthelmintic. It works by killing sensitive parasites.

detailsOne: Aldurazyme (laronidase) is used to treat some of the symptoms of a genetic condition called Hurler syndrome, also called mucopolysaccharidosis, or MPS I. Forms of MPS I include Hurler syndrome, Hurler-Scheie syndrome, and Scheie syndrome.
detailsTwo: MPS I is a metabolic disorder in which the body lacks the enzyme needed to break down certain sugars and proteins. These substances can build up in the body, causing enlarged organs, abnormal bone structure, changes in facial features, breathing problems, heart problems, vision or hearing loss, and changes in mental or physical abilities.

detailsOne: Xenazine (tetrabenazine) reduces the amount of certain chemicals in the body that are overly active in people with Huntington's disease.
detailsTwo: Xenazine is used to treat
(uncontrolled muscle movements).

detailsOne: Treating severe muscle spasms due to a variety of causes, including brain or spinal cord injuries.
detailsTwo: Lioresal is a muscle relaxant and antispastic agent. It reduces the frequency and severity of muscle spasms that occur as a result of neurological disorders, such as multiple sclerosis.

detailsOne: Gardasil (HPV quadrivalent vaccine) and Gardasil 9 (HPV 9-valent vaccine) are used in both females and males. Another form of HPV vaccine (Cervarix) is used only in females. This medication guide provides information only for Gardasil (HPV quadrivalent vaccine).
detailsTwo: Human papillomavirus (HPV) can cause
, cancer of the
, anal cancer, and various cancers of the vulva or vagina.

detailsOne: Preventing certain diseases (eg, anal, cervical, vulvar, or vaginal cancer; genital warts; anal, cervical, vulvar, or vaginal lesions or tumors) caused by HPV infection in females 9 to 26 years old. It is also used in males 9 to 15 years old to prevent anal cancer, anal lesions or tumors, or genital warts caused by HPV infection.
detailsTwo: Gardasil 9 is a vaccine. It works by stimulating the body to produce antibodies against HPV infection.

detailsOne: Aldara (imiquimod) is an immune response modifier. Aldara is used to treat actinic keratosis (a condition caused by too much sun exposure) on the face and scalp.
detailsTwo: Aldara (for the skin) is also used to treat a minor form of skin cancer called superficial basal cell carcinoma, when surgery would not be an appropriate treatment.

detailsOne: Treating and preventing ulcers of the stomach and small intestine, and treating gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD). It may be used for treating esophagitis (inflammation of the esophagus) caused by acid reflux and certain conditions that cause increased acid secretion (eg, Zollinger-Ellison syndrome). It may also be used to treat other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Tagamet is an H
(histamine) blocker. It works by blocking one of the chemicals, histamine, that stimulates the release of acid into the stomach. This reduces acidity in the stomach.

detailsOne: Cimetidine is in a group of drugs called histamine receptor antagonists. Cimetidine works by decreasing the amount of acid your stomach produces.
detailsTwo: Cimetidine is used to treat and prevent certain types of ulcer, and to treat conditions that cause the stomach to produce too much acid. Cimetidine is also used to treat gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), when stomach acid backs up into the esophagus and causes heartburn.

detailsOne: Podophyllum resin is made from the extracts of certain plants (such as American mandrake, May apple, Duck's foot, Indian apple).
detailsTwo: Podophyllum resin topical (for the skin) is used to treat genital and anal warts in adults. This medicine is for use only on warts outside the genitals and around the outside of the anus. Podophyllum resin topical is not for use inside the vagina, cervix, rectum, or urethra (the tube for passing urine out of your bladder).

detailsOne: Removing genital warts. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Podocon is a cytotoxic agent. It works by preventing growth of the wart tissue.

detailsOne: Resorcinol works by breaking down rough, scaly, or hardened skin. Resorcinol also disinfects the skin to help fight infection.
detailsTwo: Resorcinol topical (for the skin) is used to treat pain and itching caused by minor cuts and scrapes, burns, insect bites, poison ivy, sunburn, or other skin irritations. Resorcinol topical is also used to treat acne, eczema, psoriasis, seborrhea, corns, calluses, warts, and other skin disorders.

detailsOne: Removing genital warts. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Pododerm is a cytotoxic agent. It works by preventing growth of the wart tissue.

detailsOne: Resorcinol works by breaking down rough, scaly, or hardened skin. Resorcinol also disinfects the skin to help fight infection.
detailsTwo: Resorcinol topical (for the skin) is used to treat pain and itching caused by minor cuts and scrapes, burns, insect bites, poison ivy, sunburn, or other skin irritations. Resorcinol topical is also used to treat acne, eczema, psoriasis, seborrhea, corns, calluses, warts, and other skin disorders.

detailsOne: Treating symptoms of menopause in patients who do not respond to estrogens used alone. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Estratest includes 2 naturally occurring hormones, an estrogen and an androgen. It is used to treat symptoms of menopause in women whose bodies do not produce enough of these hormones.

detailsOne: Brisdelle (paroxetine) is an antidepressant belonging to a group of drugs called selective serotonin reuptake inhibitors (SSRIs). Paroxetine affects chemicals in the brain that may become unbalanced.
detailsTwo: Brisdelle is use for the treatment of moderate to severe vasomotor symptoms (VMS) associated with menopause.

detailsOne: Duavee contains a comination of bazedoxifene and conjugated estrogens. Bazedoxifene blocks estrogen from reaching certain cells in the uterine lining, to protect against overgrowth of uterine tissue. Estrogen is a female sex hormone produced by the ovaries. Conjugated estrogens are a mixture of estrogen hormones.
detailsTwo: Duavee is used short-term in women after menopause to treat moderate to severe hot flashes, and to prevent osteoporosis. This medicine is used in women who have NOT had a hysterectomy (uterus removed).

detailsOne: Treating loss of appetite and weight loss in certain patients. It is also used to treat unexplained, significant weight loss in patients who have AIDS. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Megace suspension is a progesterone hormone. Exactly how it works to treat loss of appetite and weight loss is unknown.

detailsOne: Treating symptoms of menopause in patients who do not respond to estrogens used alone. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Estratest H.S. includes 2 naturally occurring hormones, an estrogen and an androgen. It is used to treat symptoms of menopause in women whose bodies do not produce enough of these hormones.

detailsOne: Esterified estrogens are female sex hormones necessary for many processes in the body.
detailsTwo: Methyltestosterone is a man-made form of testosterone, a naturally occurring sex hormone that is produced in a man's testicles. Small amounts of testosterone are also produced in a woman's ovaries and adrenal system.

detailsOne: Pyrantel is an "antihelmintic," or anti-worm, medication. It prevents worms from growing or multiplying in your body.
detailsTwo: Pyrantel is used to treat infections caused by worms such as pinworm and roundworm.

detailsOne: Treating pinworm infections.
detailsTwo: Pin-X chewable tablets are an anthelmintic agent. It works by paralyzing the nervous system of intestinal parasites (worms). The parasite is then passed in the stool.

detailsOne: Treating certain worm infections (eg, pinworm, roundworm).
detailsTwo: Reese's Pinworm Medicine is an anthelmintic agent. It works by paralyzing the nervous system of intestinal parasites (worms). The parasite is then passed in the stool.

detailsTwo: Pyrantel is used to treat infections caused by worms such as pinworm and roundworm.

detailsOne: Rx only
Zyrtec (cetirizine) is an antihistamine that reduces the effects of natural chemical histamine in the body. Histamine can produce symptoms of sneezing, itching, watery eyes, and runny nose.
detailsTwo: Zyrtec is used to treat cold or allergy symptoms such as sneezing, itching, watery eyes, or runny nose.

detailsOne: Claritin (loratadine) is an antihistamine that reduces the effects of natural chemical histamine in the body. Histamine can produce symptoms of sneezing, itching, watery eyes, and runny nose.
detailsTwo: Claritin is used to treat sneezing, runny nose, watery eyes, hives, skin rash, itching, and other cold or

detailsOne: Allegra (fexofenadine) is an antihistamine that reduces the effects of natural chemical histamine in the body. Histamine can produce symptoms of sneezing, itching, watery eyes, and runny nose.
detailsTwo: Allegra is used to treat the symptoms of seasonal allergies (hay fever) in adults and children.

detailsOne: Xyzal (levocetirizine) is an antihistamine that reduces the effects of natural chemical histamine in the body. Histamine can produce symptoms of sneezing, itching, watery eyes, and runny nose.
detailsTwo: Xyzal is used to treat symptoms of year-round (perennial)
in adults and children who are at least 6 months old. It is also used to treat symptoms of seasonal allergies in adults and children who are at least 2 years old.

detailsOne: Benadryl is an antihistamine. Diphenhydramine blocks the effects of the naturally occurring chemical histamine in the body.
detailsTwo: Benadryl is used to treat sneezing; runny nose; itching, watery eyes; hives; rashes; itching; and other symptoms of allergies and the common cold.

detailsOne: Relieving symptoms of seasonal allergies such as runny nose; sneezing; itchy, watery eyes; or itching of the nose and throat. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Alavert syrup is an antihistamine. It works by blocking a substance in the body called histamine. This helps to decrease allergy symptoms.

detailsOne: Preventing or treating symptoms of hay fever and other upper respiratory allergies or the common cold, such as runny nose, sneezing, itching of the nose and throat, and itchy, watery eyes, and relieving cough. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Benadryl Allergy Fastmelt dispersible tablets are an antihistamine and anticholinergic. It works by blocking the action of histamine, reducing the symptoms of an allergic reaction. It also works in the brain to cause sedation.

detailsOne: Xolair (omalizumab) is an antibody that helps decrease allergic responses in the body.
detailsTwo: Xolair is used to treat moderate to severe

that is caused by allergies in adults and children who are at least 6 years old. Xolair is used when asthma symptoms are not controlled by asthma inhaled steroid medicine. It is not a rescue medicine for treating an asthma attack.

detailsOne: Relieving symptoms of seasonal allergies such as runny nose; sneezing; itchy, watery eyes; or itching of the nose and throat. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Claritin 24 Hour Allergy is an antihistamine. It works by blocking a substance in the body called histamine. This helps to decrease allergy symptoms.

detailsOne: Phenergan (promethazine) belongs to a group of drugs called phenothiazines. It works by changing the actions of chemicals in your brain. Promethazine also acts as an antihistamine. It blocks the effects of the naturally occurring chemical histamine in your body.
detailsTwo: Phenergan is used to treat allergy symptoms such as itching, runny nose, sneezing, itchy or watery eyes, hives, and itchy skin rashes.

detailsOne: Clarinex is an antihistamine that reduces the effects of the natural chemical histamine in the body. Histamine can produce symptoms of sneezing, itching, watery eyes, and runny nose.
detailsTwo: Clarinex is used to treat the symptoms of allergies, such as sneezing, watery eyes, and runny nose. It is also used to treat skin hives and itching in people with chronic skin reactions.

detailsOne: Cetirizine is an antihistamine that reduces the effects of natural chemical histamine in the body. Histamine can produce symptoms of sneezing, itching, watery eyes, and runny nose.
detailsTwo: Cetirizine is used to treat cold or allergy symptoms such as sneezing, itching, watery eyes, or runny nose.

detailsOne: Relieving symptoms of seasonal allergies such as runny nose; sneezing; itchy, watery eyes; or itching of the nose and throat. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Children's Claritin Allergy chewable tablets are an antihistamine. It works by blocking a substance in the body called histamine. This helps to decrease allergy symptoms.

detailsOne: Treating progressive and potentially life-threatening fungal infections. It may be used to treat certain protozoal infections (American mucocutaneous leishmaniasis) or other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Amphocin is an antifungal antibiotic. It works by killing the fungus and preventing its reproduction.

detailsOne: Relieving symptoms of seasonal allergies such as runny nose; sneezing; itchy, watery eyes; or itching of the nose and throat. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Claritin Reditabs orally disintegrating tablets are an antihistamine. It works by blocking a substance in the body called histamine. This helps to decrease allergy symptoms.

detailsOne: Treating progressive and potentially life-threatening fungal infections. It may be used to treat certain protozoal infections (American mucocutaneous leishmaniasis) or other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Fungizone is an antifungal antibiotic. It works by killing the fungus and preventing its reproduction.

detailsOne: Treating progressive and potentially life-threatening fungal infections. It may be used to treat certain protozoal infections (American mucocutaneous leishmaniasis) or other conditions as determined by your doctor.

detailsOne: Treating progressive and potentially life-threatening fungal infections. It may be used to treat certain protozoal infections (American mucocutaneous leishmaniasis) or other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Amphocin is an antifungal antibiotic. It works by killing the fungus and preventing its reproduction.

detailsOne: Diflucan (fluconazole) is an antifungal medicine.
detailsTwo: Diflucan is used to treat infections caused by fungus, which can invade any part of the body including the mouth, throat, esophagus, lungs, bladder, genital area, and the blood.

detailsOne: Sporanox (itraconazole) is an antifungal medication that fights infections caused by fungus.
detailsTwo: Sporanox is used to treat infections caused by fungus, which can invade any part of the body including the lungs, mouth or throat, toenails, or fingernails.

detailsOne: Nizoral (ketoconazole) is an antifungal medication that fights infections caused by fungus.
detailsTwo: Ketoconazole is not for use in treating fungal infections of the fingernails or toenails. This medicine is also not for use in treating prostate cancer or Cushing syndrome.

detailsOne: Treating a severe and potentially life-threatening fungal infection (aspergillosis) in certain patients. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Amphotec is an antifungal antibiotic. It works by killing the fungus and preventing its reproduction.

detailsOne: Treating invasive fungal infections in patients who cannot tolerate other forms of Abelcet.
detailsTwo: Abelcet is an antifungal antibiotic. It works by killing the fungus and preventing its reproduction.

detailsOne: Treating fungal infections. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Sporanox PulsePak is an azole antifungal. It kills sensitive fungi by interfering with the formation of the fungal cell membrane.

detailsOne: Treating fungal infections of the toenail in certain patients. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Onmel is an azole antifungal. It works by killing sensitive fungi.

detailsOne: Vinblastine is a cancer medication that interferes with the growth and spread of cancer cells in the body.
detailsTwo: Vinblastine is used to treat Hodgkin's disease, certain types of lymphoma, testicular cancer, breast cancer, choriocarcinoma (a type of uterine cancer), Kaposi's sarcoma, and Letterer-Siwe disease.

detailsOne: Aldactone (spironolactone) is a potassium-sparing diuretic (water pill) that prevents your body from absorbing too much salt and keeps your potassium levels from getting too low.
detailsTwo: Aldactone is used to diagnose or treat a condition in which you have too much aldosterone in your body. Aldosterone is a hormone produced by your adrenal glands to help regulate the salt and water balance in your body.

detailsOne: Vaniqa (eflornithine) interferes with a chemical in hair follicles under the skin, which slows hair growth where the medicine is applied.
detailsTwo: Vaniqa cream is used to reduce unwanted facial hair in women.

detailsOne: Lupron (leuprolide) overstimulates the body's own production of certain hormones, which causes that production to shut down temporarily. Leuprolide reduces the amount of testosterone in men or estrogen in women.
detailsTwo: Lupron is used in men to treat the symptoms of
. Leuprolide treats only the symptoms of prostate cancer and does not treat the cancer itself.

detailsOne: Flutamide is an antiandrogen. It works in the body to prevent the actions of androgens (male hormones).
detailsTwo: Flutamide is used together with another hormone to treat prostate cancer.

detailsOne: Treating symptoms of advanced prostate cancer. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Viadur implant is a gonadotropin-releasing hormone agonist. It works by decreasing levels of certain hormones produced by the testes and ovaries. It prevents the growth of certain tumors that need these hormones to grow.

detailsOne: Treating symptoms of advanced prostate cancer. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Lupron Depot is a gonadotropin-releasing hormone (GnRH) agonist. It works by decreasing levels of certain hormones produced by the testes and ovaries. This prevents the growth of certain tumors that need these hormones to grow.

detailsOne: Treating endometriosis. It may be used alone or with other medicines (eg, norethindrone). It is used with iron therapy to improve anemia before surgery in patients with fibroids of the uterus. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Lupron Depot 3.75 mg suspension is a gonadotropin-releasing hormone (GnRH) agonist. It works by decreasing levels of certain hormones produced by the testes and ovaries. This prevents the growth of certain tumors that need these hormones to grow.

detailsOne: Treating endometriosis. It may be used alone or with other medicines (eg, norethindrone). It is used with iron therapy to improve anemia before surgery in patients with fibroids of the uterus. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Lupron Depot 11.25 mg depot suspension is a gonadotropin-releasing hormone (GnRH) agonist. It works by decreasing levels of certain hormones and preventing the growth of certain tumors that need these hormones to grow.

detailsOne: Treating patients who have very high triglyceride levels. It is used in addition to a low-fat diet.
detailsTwo: Lovaza is a lipid-regulating agent. Exactly how it works is not known. It may decrease the production of triglycerides in the liver.

detailsOne: TriCor (fenofibrate) helps reduce cholesterol and triglycerides (fatty acids) in the blood. High levels of these types of fat in the blood are associated with an increased risk of atherosclerosis (clogged arteries).
detailsTwo: TriCor is used to treat high cholesterol and high triglyceride levels.

detailsOne: Fish Oil capsules contain omega-3 polyunsaturated fatty acids. Omega-3 polyunsaturated fatty acids are found in oils from certain types of fish, vegetables, and other plant sources. These fatty acids are not made by the body and must be consumed in the diet. Omega-3 polyunsaturated fatty acids work by lowering the body's production of triglycerides. High levels of triglycerides can lead to coronary artery disease, heart disease, and stroke.
detailsTwo: Fish Oil are used together with diet and exercise to help lower triglyceride levels in the blood.

detailsOne: Vascepa (icosapent) works in the liver and bloodstream to reduce very low-density triglycerides.
detailsTwo: Vascepa is used together with a low-fat and low-cholesterol diet to reduce triglycerides (fats) in adults with severely high triglycerides.

detailsOne: Lowering high cholesterol and triglyceride levels in the blood. It also increases high-density lipoprotein (HDL) ("good") cholesterol levels. It is used along with an appropriate diet.
detailsTwo: Lipofen is a lipid-lowering agent. It works by increasing a certain substance that helps to remove triglycerides from the blood. This also helps the body to decrease the amount of other bad cholesterol in the blood.

detailsOne: Lowering high cholesterol and triglyceride levels in the blood. It also increases high-density lipoprotein (HDL) ("good") cholesterol levels. It is used along with an appropriate diet.
detailsTwo: Antara is a lipid-lowering agent. It works by increasing a certain substance that helps to remove triglycerides from the blood. This also helps the body to decrease the amount of other bad cholesterol in the blood.

detailsOne: Trilipix (fenofibric acid) helps reduce cholesterol and triglycerides (fatty acids) in the blood. High levels of these types of fat in the blood are associated with an increased risk of atherosclerosis (clogged arteries).
detailsTwo: Trilipix is used to treat high cholesterol and high triglyceride levels. It is sometimes given together with other cholesterol-lowering medications.

detailsOne: Supplementing the diet in patients who have or are at risk of developing type 2 diabetes. It should be used along with other treatments for type 2 diabetes. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.

detailsOne: Some commonly used brand names are:

Ilaris (canakinumab) is a monoclonal antibody that blocks certain proteins in the body that can affect inflammation and other immune responses. Ilaris is used to treat certain types of periodic fever syndromes, sometimes called auto-inflammatory syndromes.
detailsTwo: Periodic fever syndromes are rare and often inherited conditions caused by mutations in certain genes; usually genes that are involved in producing a certain protein or enzyme in the body. People with a periodic fever syndrome have episodes of fever and inflammation without other causes such as infection or virus.

detailsTwo: Thorazine is a phenothiazine. The exact way Thorazine works is not known.

detailsOne: Zostavax (zoster vaccine live) is used to prevent herpes zoster virus (shingles) in people age 50 and older.

detailsTwo: Prednisone is used as an anti-inflammatory or an immunosuppressant medication. Prednisone treats many different conditions such as allergic disorders, skin conditions, ulcerative colitis, arthritis, lupus, psoriasis, or breathing disorders.

detailsTwo: Twinrix is a vaccine. It works by stimulating the body to produce antibodies against hepatitis A and B.

detailsOne: Pediarix vaccine is used to help prevent diphtheria, hepatitis B, pertussis, polio and tetanus in children who are ages 6 weeks to 6 years old, before the child has reached his or her 7th birthday.
detailsTwo: Diphtheria, pertussis, and tetanus are serious diseases caused by bacteria. Diphtheria causes a thick coating in the nose, throat, and airways. It can lead to breathing problems, paralysis, heart failure, or death. Pertussis (whooping cough) causes coughing so severe that it interferes with eating, drinking, or breathing. These spells can last for weeks and can lead to pneumonia, seizures (convulsions), brain damage, and death. Tetanus (lockjaw) causes painful tightening of the muscles, usually all over the body. It can lead to "locking" of the jaw so the victim cannot open the mouth or swallow. Tetanus leads to death in about 1 out of 10 cases.

detailsOne: Hepatitis B is a serious disease caused by a virus. Hepatitis B causes inflammation of the liver, vomiting, and jaundice (yellowing of the skin or eyes). Hepatitis can lead to liver cancer, cirrhosis, or death.
detailsTwo: Hepatitis B is a disease of the liver that is spread through blood or bodily fluids, sexual contact or sharing IV drug needles with an infected person, or during childbirth when a baby is born to a mother who is infected.

detailsOne: Immune globulin intramuscular (IGIM) is a sterilized solution made from human plasma. It contains the antibodies to help your body protect itself against infection from various diseases.
detailsTwo: IGIM is used to prevent or reduce the severity of infection by hepatitis A, measles, chickenpox (varicella), and rubella. IGIM is also used to prevent or reduce the severity of other infections in individuals with immunoglobulin deficiencies.

detailsOne: Defibrotide works by increasing the breakdown of clots in the blood.
detailsTwo: Defibrotide is used to treat severe veno-occlusive disease (VOD) in adults and children who have undergone chemotherapy and a stem-cell transplant. VOD happens when blood vessels in the liver become blocked, which decreases blood flow and can lead to liver damage.

detailsOne: Nexavar (sorafenib) is a cancer medication that interferes with the growth and spread of cancer cells in the body.
detailsTwo: Nexavar is used to treat liver cancer, thyroid cancer, or a type of kidney cancer called advanced renal cell carcinoma.

detailsOne: Xifaxan (rifaximin) is an antibiotic that fights bacterial infection only in the intestines.
detailsTwo: Rifaximin works differently from other antibiotics because it passes through your stomach and into your intestines without being absorbed into your blood stream. Because rifaximin treats only the intestinal tract, it will not treat infections of other parts of the body.

detailsOne: Preventing and treating portal-systemic encephalopathy. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.

detailsOne: Treating constipation. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.

detailsOne: Reducing bacteria in the intestines. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Neo-Fradin solution is an aminoglycoside antibiotic. It kills sensitive bacteria by stopping the production of essential proteins needed by the bacteria to survive.

detailsOne: Treating amoeba infection in the intestines. It is also used in combination with other medicines to manage a serious complication of liver disease (hepatic coma). It may be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Humatin is an antibacterial agent. It works by killing sensitive bacteria.

detailsTwo: Neomycin is used to reduce the risk of infection during surgery of your intestines. Neomycin is also used to reduce the symptoms of hepatic coma.

detailsOne: Reducing or preventing excessive bleeding and reducing the need for blood clotting factor transfusions during or after tooth extractions in patients with hemophilia. It is also used to prevent or reduce bleeding during certain medical procedures (eg, cervical surgery) and to treat certain bleeding problems (eg, nosebleeds, bleeding inside the eye, heavy menstrual periods) in patients whose blood does not clot well. It is also used to treat hereditary angioneurotic edema. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Cyklokapron is an antifibrinolytic. It works by preventing blood clots from breaking down too quickly. This helps to reduce excessive bleeding.

detailsOne: Treating nighttime bedwetting. detailsTwo: Lysteda is used to treat heavy menstrual bleeding. This medication will not treat premenstrual syndrome (PMS).

detailsOne: Natazia contains a combination of dienogest and estradiol. Dienogest and estradiol are female hormones that prevent ovulation (the release of an egg from an ovary). This medicine also causes changes in your cervical mucus and uterine lining, making it harder for sperm to reach the uterus and harder for a fertilized egg to attach to the uterus.
detailsTwo: Natazia is used to

detailsOne: Decreasing fatigue, muscle cramps, or heat exhaustion due to excessive sweating. The use of Temp Tabs for these conditions has not been evaluated or approved by the Food and Drug Administration. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Temp Tabs is an electrolyte combination. It works by replacing electrolytes in the body.

detailsOne: Plavix (clopidogrel) helps to prevent platelets in your blood from sticking together and forming a blood clot. Unwanted blood clots can occur with certain heart or blood vessel conditions.
detailsTwo: Plavix is used to prevent blood clots after a recent heart attack or stroke, and in people with certain disorders of the heart or blood vessels.

detailsOne: Treating minor aches and pains (eg, caused by headache, muscle aches, backache, arthritis, the common cold, toothache, menstrual cramps). It is used in certain patients to decrease the risk of stroke, heart attack, and death associated with stroke or heart attack. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Bayer is a salicylate. It works by inhibiting several different chemical processes within the body that cause pain, inflammation, and fever. It also reduces the tendency for blood to clot.

detailsOne: Treating blood clots in the lungs. It is also used to improve heart function and survival following a heart attack. It is also used to improve recovery and reduce disability in certain patients who have had a stroke. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Activase is a tissue plasminogen activator (tPA). It works by helping to break down unwanted blood clots.

detailsOne: Altace (ramipril) is an ACE inhibitor. ACE stands for angiotensin converting enzyme.
detailsTwo: Altace is used to treat high blood pressure (hypertension) or congestive heart failure, and to improve survival after a heart attack.

detailsOne: Coumadin (warfarin) is an anticoagulant (blood thinner). Warfarin reduces the formation of blood clots.
detailsTwo: Coumadin is used to treat or prevent blood clots in veins or arteries, which can reduce the risk of
, or other serious conditions.

detailsOne: Metoprolol is a beta-blocker that affects the heart and circulation (blood flow through arteries and veins).
detailsTwo: Metoprolol is used to treat angina (chest pain) and hypertension (high blood pressure). It is also used to treat or prevent heart attack.

detailsOne: Treating high blood pressure, alone or with other medicines; long-term treatment of chest pain; and reducing the risk of death because of heart problems in patients who have had a heart attack. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Lopressor is a beta-adrenergic blocking agent (beta-blocker). It works by reducing the amount of work the heart has to do (reduces chest pain) and the amount of blood the heart pumps out (lowers high blood pressure). It is also used to stabilize the heart rhythm in conditions in which the heart is beating too fast or in an irregular rhythm.

detailsOne: Preventing or relieving a sudden attack of angina (chest pain) caused by heart disease. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Nitrostat is a nitrate. It works by dilating (widening) blood vessels. Chest pain occurs when the heart needs more oxygen than it can get. Dilating blood vessels allows blood to flow more easily. This reduces the heart's workload and the amount of oxygen needed by the heart.

detailsOne: Treating minor aches and pains (eg, caused by headache, muscle aches, backache, arthritis, the common cold, toothache, menstrual cramps). detailsTwo: Ecotrin delayed-release tablets are a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID). It works by inhibiting several different chemical processes within the body that cause pain, inflammation, and fever. It also reduces the tendency for blood to clot.

detailsOne: Treating high blood pressure, alone or with other medicines; long-term treatment of chest pain; and reducing the risk of death because of heart problems in patients who have had a heart attack. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Metoprolol tartrate is a beta-adrenergic blocking agent (beta-blocker). It works by reducing the amount of work the heart has to do (reduces chest pain) and the amount of blood the heart pumps out (lowers high blood pressure). It is also used to stabilize the heart rhythm in conditions in which the heart is beating too fast or in an irregular rhythm.

detailsOne: Fioricet contains a combination of acetaminophen, butalbital, and caffeine Acetaminophen is a pain reliever and fever reducer. Butalbital is in a group of drugs called barbiturates. It relaxes muscle contractions involved in a tension headache. Caffeine is a central nervous system stimulant. It relaxes muscle contractions in blood vessels to improve blood flow.
detailsTwo: Fioricet is used to treat tension headaches that are caused by muscle contractions.

, or minor injury.

Caffeine constricts blood vessels in the brain, which may help to relieve headache pain. Butalbital reduces anxiety and helps you to relax.

detailsTwo: Anaprox is an NSAID. Exactly how it works is not known. It may block certain substances in the body that are linked to inflammation. NSAIDs treat the symptoms of pain and inflammation. They do not treat the disease that causes those symptoms.

detailsOne: Treating rheumatoid arthritis, osteoarthritis, and ankylosing spondylitis. It is used to treat tendonitis, bursitis, gout, menstrual cramps, or mild to moderate pain. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.

Caffeine may work by constricting blood vessels that may cause headaches. Butalbital has a depressant effect that reduces anxiety and causes relaxation. Codeine works in the central nervous system to decrease pain.

detailsOne: Use caution when driving, operating machinery, or performing other hazardous activities. Percogesic may cause dizziness or drowsiness. If you experience dizziness or drowsiness, avoid these activities.

Effective and well-tolerated, Sklice Lotion treats lice in most patients with a single 10-minute application of the lotion, without nit combing.

detailsTwo: Ioversol is used to help diagnose certain disorders of the heart, brain, and blood vessels.

detailsOne: Erbitux (cetuximab) is a cancer medicine that interferes with the growth and spread of cancer cells in the body.
detailsTwo: Erbitux is used to treat cancers of the
and rectum. It is also used to treat head and neck cancer.

detailsOne: Taxotere (docetaxel) is a cancer medication that interferes with the growth and spread of cancer cells in the body.
detailsTwo: Taxotere is used to treat breast cancer, lung cancer, prostate cancer, stomach cancer, and head/neck cancer.

detailsOne: Treating certain types of cancer. It is also used to control severe psoriasis and severe rheumatoid arthritis in certain patients. It may be used alone or with other medicines. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Trexall is an antimetabolite. It works to treat cancer and psoriasis by slowing the growth of cancer cells and abnormal skin cells. Exactly how Trexall works to treat rheumatoid arthritis is unknown. It reduces symptoms of inflammation (eg, pain, swelling, stiffness) caused by rheumatoid arthritis.

detailsOne: Keytruda (pembrolizumab) is a cancer medicine that interferes with the growth and spread of cancer cells in the body.
detailsTwo: Keytruda is used to treat advanced skin cancer (
) that has spread to other parts of the body or cannot be surgically removed.

detailsOne: Nexavar (sorafenib) is a cancer medication that interferes with the growth and spread of cancer cells in the body.
detailsTwo: Nexavar is used to treat liver cancer, thyroid cancer, or a type of kidney cancer called advanced renal cell carcinoma.

detailsOne: Aspirin and caffeine is a salicylate (sa-LIS-il-ate). It works by reducing substances in the body that cause pain, fever, and inflammation.
detailsTwo: Caffeine is used in this product to increase the pain relieving effects of aspirin and caffeine.

detailsOne: Treating all forms of tuberculosis (TB). Rifadin is also used to treat patients who do not have meningitis but carry the meningitis bacteria in their nose and throat and may spread the bacteria to others. Rifadin does not treat meningitis. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Rifadin is a rifamycin antibiotic. It works by killing or stopping the growth of sensitive bacteria.

detailsOne: Aspirin and caffeine is a salicylate (sa-LIS-il-ate). It works by reducing substances in the body that cause pain, fever, and inflammation.

detailsOne: Preventing infection caused by Haemophilus influenza type b bacteria in children 2 months through 5 years old.
detailsTwo: ActHIB is a vaccine. It works by causing your immune system to produce antibodies that help to prevent infection caused by H. influenza.

detailsOne: Hiberix is a brand of haemophilus B vaccine. Haemophilus influenzae type B (Hib) is a type of influenza (flu) caused by bacteria. Haemophilus B influenzae bacteria can infect the lungs or throat, and can also spread to the blood, bones, joints, brain, or spinal cord. The bacteria infection can cause breathing problems or meningitis, and these infections can be fatal.
detailsTwo: Hiberix is used to prevent haemophilus B in children, and is sometimes combined with vaccines to protect against other diseases. Hiberix is given to children between the ages of 2 months and 18 months old.

detailsOne: Pentacel is a vaccine used to improve immunity against diphtheria, haemophilus influenzae type B, pertussis, polio, and tetanus, all serious diseases caused by bacteria or viruses.
detailsTwo: Diphtheria causes a thick coating in the nose, throat, and airways. It can lead to breathing problems, paralysis, heart failure, or death.

detailsOne: Pediarix vaccine is used to help prevent diphtheria, hepatitis B, pertussis, polio and tetanus in children who are ages 6 weeks to 6 years old, before the child has reached his or her 7th birthday.
detailsTwo: Diphtheria, pertussis, and tetanus are serious diseases caused by bacteria. Diphtheria causes a thick coating in the nose, throat, and airways. It can lead to breathing problems, paralysis, heart failure, or death. Pertussis (whooping cough) causes coughing so severe that it interferes with eating, drinking, or breathing. These spells can last for weeks and can lead to pneumonia, seizures (convulsions), brain damage, and death. Tetanus (lockjaw) causes painful tightening of the muscles, usually all over the body. It can lead to "locking" of the jaw so the victim cannot open the mouth or swallow. Tetanus leads to death in about 1 out of 10 cases.

detailsOne: MenHibrix vaccine is used to help prevent haemophilus B and meningococcal disease in children.
detailsTwo: Haemophilus influenzae type B (Hib) is a bacteria that can cause serious illness, including breathing problems or meningitis. Hib infection usually affects children and can be fatal.

detailsOne: rif-AM-pin
Haemophilus influenzae type B (Hib) is a bacteria that can cause serious illness, including breathing problems or meningitis. Hib infection usually affects children and can be fatal.
detailsTwo: Haemophilus B conjugate (PMP-OMP) vaccine is used to help prevent this disease in children. This vaccine is given to children between the ages of 2 months and 6 years old.

detailsOne: Treating all forms of tuberculosis (TB). Rifadin IV is also used to treat patients who do not have meningitis but carry the meningitis bacteria in their nose and throat and may spread the bacteria to others. Rifadin IV does not treat meningitis. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Rifadin IV is a rifamycin antibiotic. It works by killing or stopping the growth of sensitive bacteria.

detailsOne: Tamiflu (oseltamivir) is an antiviral medication that blocks the actions of influenza virus types A and B in your body.
detailsTwo: Tamiflu is used to treat influenza in people 2 weeks of age and older who have had flu symptoms for 2 days or less. Oseltamivir may also be given to prevent influenza in people who are at least 1 year old, who may be exposed but do not yet have symptoms. Tamiflu will not treat the common cold.

detailsOne: Relenza (zanamivir) is an antiviral medication. It blocks the actions of viruses in your body.
detailsTwo: Relenza is used to treat flu symptoms caused by influenza virus in patients who have had symptoms for less than 2 days. Relenza may also be given to prevent influenza in people who may be exposed but do not yet have symptoms. Zanamivir will not treat the common cold.

detailsOne: Cinryze (complement C1 esterase inhibitor) is a man-made form of a protein that occurs naturally in the blood stream and helps control inflammation in the body. In people with hereditary angioedema, complement C1 esterase inhibitor does not function properly or occurs in low levels.
detailsTwo: Complement C1 esterase inhibitor is used in people with hereditary angioedema. Hereditary angioedema can cause attacks of swelling and symptoms such as stomach problems or trouble breathing. The Cinryze brand is used to prevent attacks of angioedema. The Berinert brand of this medicine is used to treat attacks of angioedema.

detailsOne: Berinert (complement C1 esterase inhibitor) is a man-made form of a protein that occurs naturally in the blood stream and helps control inflammation in the body. In people with hereditary
, complement C1 esterase inhibitor does not function properly or occurs in low levels. Hereditary angioedema can cause attacks of swelling and symptoms such as stomach problems or trouble breathing.
detailsTwo: Complement C1 esterase inhibitor is used in people with hereditary angioedema. Berinert is used to treat attacks of angioedema. The Cinryze brand of complement C1 esterase inhibitor is used to prevent attacks of angioedema.

detailsOne: Kalbitor (ecallantide) is used to treat attacks of hereditary
(an immune system disorder). This medication is used in people who are at least 16 years old.
detailsTwo: Kalbitor is not a cure for hereditary angioedema.

detailsOne: Firazyr (icatibant) is used to treat attacks of hereditary angioedema (an immune system disorder). This medication is used in people who are at least 18 years old.
detailsTwo: Firazyr is not a cure for hereditary angioedema.

detailsOne: Treating symptoms associated with Parkinson disease and parkinsonism-like symptoms caused by other conditions. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Sinemet is an antidyskinetic combination. Levodopa is transformed by the body and the brain into a substance that helps to decrease tremors and other symptoms of Parkinson disease. Carbidopa helps levodopa to reach the brain.

detailsOne: Conestat alfa is a manmade form of a protein called C1 esterase inhibitor that occurs naturally in the bloodstream and helps control swelling in the body. People with a condition called hereditary angioedema do not have enough of this protein. Hereditary angioedema can cause attacks of swelling and symptoms such as stomach problems or trouble breathing.
detailsTwo: Conestat alfa is used to treat angioedema attacks in people with hereditary angioedema. Conestat alfa is for use in adults and children who are at least 13 years old.

detailsOne: Treating symptoms associated with Parkinson disease and parkinsonism-like symptoms caused by other conditions. It is used in combination with another medicine called levodopa. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Lodosyn is an antiparkinson agent. It works by helping levodopa to reach the brain.

detailsOne: Treating symptoms associated with Parkinson disease and parkinsonism-like symptoms caused by other conditions. It may also be used to treat certain conditions as determined by your doctor.

Travatan Z is a new formulation that eliminates benzalkonium chloride (BAK) from Alcon's existing Travatan solution and replaces BAK with SOFZIA(TM), a robust ionic buffered preservative system that is gentle to the ocular surface. Alcon developed this BAK-free version of Travatan because long-term use of topical solutions containing BAK may compromise the ocular surface and exacerbate conditions such as dry eye.

detailsOne: TriCor (fenofibrate) helps reduce cholesterol and triglycerides (fatty acids) in the blood. High levels of these types of fat in the blood are associated with an increased risk of atherosclerosis (clogged arteries).
detailsTwo: TriCor is used to treat high cholesterol and high triglyceride levels.

detailsOne: Niaspan ER extended release works by reducing LDL ("bad") cholesterol and triglycerides and increasing HDL ("good") cholesterol. Niaspan contains niacin, also called nicotinic acid, a B vitamin (vitamin B3). It occurs naturally in plants and animals and is present in many multiple vitamin supplements.
detailsTwo: Niaspan ER is used to lower cholesterol and triglycerides (types of fat) in the blood. It is also used to lower the risk of heart attack in people with high cholesterol who have already had a heart attack. It is sometimes used to treat coronary artery disease (also called atherosclerosis).

detailsOne: Lowering high cholesterol and triglyceride levels in the blood. It also increases high-density lipoprotein (HDL) ("good") cholesterol levels. It is used along with an appropriate diet.
detailsTwo: Antara is a lipid-lowering agent. It works by increasing a certain substance that helps to remove triglycerides from the blood. This also helps the body to decrease the amount of other bad cholesterol in the blood.

detailsOne: Niacin, also called nicotinic acid, is a B vitamin (vitamin B3). It occurs naturally in plants and animals, and is also added to many foods as a vitamin supplement. Niacin is also present in many multiple vitamins and nutritional supplements.

It is used in certain patients to reduce the risk of heart attack and chest pain caused by angina. It is also used to slow blood vessel blockage and to reduce the need for medical procedures to open blocked heart blood vessels. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Altoprev extended-release tablets are an HMG-CoA reductase inhibitor, also known as a "statin." It works by reducing the production of certain fatty substances in the body, including cholesterol.

detailsOne: Treating infertility in certain women. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.

detailsOne: Folic acid is a type of B vitamin that is normally found in foods such as dried beans, peas, lentils, oranges, whole-wheat products, liver, asparagus, beets, broccoli, brussels sprouts, and spinach.

detailsOne: Folate is a form of B vitamin that occurs naturally in many foods. Folic acid is the man-made form of folate that is added to processed foods or vitamin and mineral supplements. Folate is needed in the human body for production of red blood cells.
detailsTwo: A lack (deficiency) of folate in the human body can be caused by certain diseases, by taking certain medications, or by not getting enough folate in your diet. Folate deficiency can lead to decreased red blood cells, or anemia. Folate deficiency can also cause high levels of a certain amino acid in the blood, a condition called hyperhomocysteinemia (HYE-per-HOE-moe-sis-tin-EE-mee-a).

detailsOne: Folic acid derivative; antidote for folic acid antagonists.
detailsTwo: Antidote for unintentional overdosage of methotrexate (e.g., resulting from impaired elimination) and other folic acid antagonists (e.g., pyrimethamine, trimethoprim).

detailsOne: Vistogard (uridine triacetate) works by slowing down cell damage caused by certain cancer medicines (capecitabine or fluorouracil).
detailsTwo: Vistogard is used to treat an overdose of capecitabine or fluorouracil.

detailsOne: Tamiflu (oseltamivir) is an antiviral medication that blocks the actions of influenza virus types A and B in your body.
detailsTwo: Tamiflu is used to treat influenza in people 2 weeks of age and older who have had flu symptoms for 2 days or less. Oseltamivir may also be given to prevent influenza in people who are at least 1 year old, who may be exposed but do not yet have symptoms. Tamiflu will not treat the common cold.

detailsOne: Coricidin contains a combination of acetaminophen and chlorpheniramine. Acetaminophen is a pain reliever and a fever reducer. Chlorpheniramine is an antihistamine that reduces the natural chemical histamine in the body. Histamine can produce symptoms of sneezing, itching, watery eyes, and runny nose.
detailsTwo: Coricidin is used to treat headache, runny nose, sneezing, watery eyes, and pain or fever caused by allergies, the common cold, or the flu.

detailsOne: Use caution when driving, operating machinery, or performing other hazardous activities. Percogesic may cause dizziness or drowsiness. If you experience dizziness or drowsiness, avoid these activities.
detailsTwo: Use alcohol cautiously. Alcohol may increase drowsiness and dizziness while you are taking Percogesic. Alcohol may also cause damage to your liver when taken with acetaminophen.

detailsOne: Treating mild to moderate aches and pains associated with headache, muscle and joint soreness, backache, menstrual cramps, colds and flu, sinusitis, toothache, and minor pain from arthritis, and to reduce fever. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Dologesic is an analgesic, antihistamine, and antipyretic combination. It works by blocking substances in the body that cause fever, pain, and inflammation. It also blocks histamine, which causes sneezing and itchy, watery eyes.

detailsOne: Acetaminophen is a pain reliever and fever reducer.
detailsTwo: Chlorpheniramine is an antihistamine that reduces the effects of natural chemical histamine in the body. Histamine can produce symptoms of sneezing, itching, watery eyes, and runny nose.

detailsOne: Acuflex contains a combination of acetaminophen and phenyltoloxamine. Acetaminophen is a pain reliever and a fever reducer. Phenyltoloxamine is an antihistamine that reduces the natural chemical histamine in the body. Histamine can produce symptoms of sneezing, itching, watery eyes, and runny nose.
detailsTwo: Acuflex is used to treat runny nose, sneezing, and pain or fever caused by the common cold, flu, or seasonal allergies.

detailsOne: Relieving symptoms of pain, sinus congestion, runny nose, sneezing, and cough due to colds, upper respiratory infections, and allergies. It may also used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: TheraFlu Flu/Cold/Cough powder packet is a decongestant, antihistamine, cough suppressant, and analgesic combination. The decongestant works by constricting blood vessels and reducing swelling in the nasal passages. The antihistamine works by blocking the action of histamine, which helps reduce symptoms such as watery eyes and sneezing. The analgesic and cough suppressant work in the brain to decrease pain and to reduce a dry or unproductive cough.

detailsOne: Acetaminophen is a pain reliever and fever reducer.
detailsTwo: Dextromethorphan is a cough suppressant. It affects the signals in the brain that trigger cough reflex.

detailsOne: Acetaminophen is a pain reliever and fever reducer.

detailsOne: Relieving pain, congestion, cough, and throat and airway irritation due to colds, flu, or hay fever. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Tylenol Cold Multi Symptom is an analgesic, decongestant, cough suppressant, and expectorant combination. It works by constricting blood vessels and reducing swelling in the nasal passages, loosening mucus and lung secretions in the chest, and making coughs more productive. The analgesic and cough suppressant works in the brain to decrease pain and to help decrease the cough reflex to reduce a dry cough.

headaches in adults and teenagers who are at least 12 years old. This medicine will only prevent migraine headaches or reduce the number of attacks. It will not treat a headache that has already begun.

detailsOne: Prednisone is a steroid. Prednisone prevents the release of substances in the body that cause inflammation. Prednisone also suppresses the immune system.
detailsTwo: Prednisone is used as an anti-inflammatory or an immunosuppressant medication. Prednisone treats many different conditions such as allergic disorders, skin conditions, ulcerative colitis, arthritis, lupus, psoriasis, or breathing disorders.

detailsTwo: Buffasal is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID). It works by inhibiting several different chemical processes within the body that cause pain, inflammation, and fever. It also reduces the tendency for blood to clot.

detailsOne: Aspirin is a salicylate (sa-LIS-il-ate). It works by reducing substances in the body that cause pain, fever, and inflammation.
detailsTwo: Aspirin is used to treat pain, and reduce fever or inflammation. Aspirin is sometimes used to treat or prevent heart attacks, strokes, and chest pain (angina). Aspirin should be used for cardiovascular conditions only under the supervision of a doctor.

detailsOne: Aspirin is a salicylate (sa-LIS-il-ate). It works by reducing substances in the body that cause pain, fever, and inflammation.
detailsTwo: Aspirin is used to treat pain, and reduce fever or inflammation. Aspirin is sometimes used to treat or prevent heart attacks, strokes, and chest pain (angina). Aspirin should be used for cardiovascular conditions only under the supervision of a doctor.

detailsOne: Treating minor aches and pains caused by the common cold, flu, sore throat, headaches, or toothaches. It may be used to reduce fever. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Children's Motrin chewable tablets are an NSAID. Exactly how it works is not known. It may block certain substances in the body that are linked to inflammation. NSAIDs treat the symptoms of pain and inflammation. They do not treat the disease that causes those symptoms.

detailsOne: Addyi (flibanserin) is available only from a certified pharmacy under a special program.
detailsTwo: Addyi is used to treat decreased sexual desire in women who have not gone through

and who have never had low sexual desire in the past. Addyi is for use only when low sexual desire is NOT caused by a medical condition, a mental disorder, relationship problems, or by using drugs or other medicines.

detailsOne: Clomid (clomiphene) is a non-steroidal fertility medicine. It causes the pituitary gland to release hormones needed to stimulate ovulation (the release of an egg from the ovary).
detailsTwo: Clomid is used to cause ovulation in women with certain medical conditions (such as polycystic ovary syndrome) that prevent naturally occurring ovulation.

detailsOne: Femara (letrozole) lowers estrogen levels in postmenopausal women, which may slow the growth of certain types of breast tumors that need estrogen to grow in the body.
detailsTwo: Femara is used to treat
in postmenopausal women. It is often given to women who have been taking tamoxifen (Nolvadex, Soltamox) for 5 years.

detailsOne: Treating infertility in certain women who have not gone through menopause. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Ovidrel is a hormone. Human chorionic gonadotropin (HCG) helps to produce mature eggs in women undergoing fertility procedures, such as in vitro fertilization, and it also stimulates ovulation (release of an egg).

detailsOne: Human chorionic gonadotropin (HCG) is a hormone that supports the normal development of an egg in a woman's ovary, and stimulates the release of the egg during ovulation.
detailsTwo: HCG is used to cause ovulation and to treat infertility in women, and to increase sperm count in men. HCG is also used in young boys when their testicles have not dropped down into the scrotum normally. This can be caused by a pituitary gland disorder.

detailsOne: Treating infertility in women. Menopur is generally used as part of an assisted reproductive technology (ART) program. It may also be used to treat certain conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Menopur is combination of hormones. It works by stimulating the ovaries to produce eggs. Human chorionic gonadotropin (hCG) is then given to cause ovulation (release of an egg).

detailsOne: Treating fertility problems in certain women who have not gone through menopause. Treating certain testicular development problems and stimulating the development of secondary sexual characteristics in certain patients. It is also used to treat boys 4 to 9 years old who have testicles that have not moved into the scrotum.
detailsTwo: Pregnyl is a hormone. Human chorionic gonadotropin (HCG) stimulates cells in the testicles to produce androgens and in the ovaries to produce progesterone. Androgens cause the development of male secondary sexual characteristics (eg, hair growth, deepening voice) and may cause the testicles to drop. HCG acts like luteinizing hormone (LH) by stimulating ovulation (release of an egg) in women.

detailsOne: Treating fertility problems in certain women who have not gone through menopause. Treating certain testicular development problems and stimulating the development of secondary sexual characteristics in certain patients. It is also used to treat boys 4 to 9 years old who have testicles that have not moved into the scrotum.
detailsTwo: Novarel is a hormone. Human chorionic gonadotropin (HCG) stimulates cells in the testicles to produce androgens and in the ovaries to produce progesterone. Androgens cause the development of male secondary sexual characteristics (eg, hair growth, deepening voice) and may cause the testicles to drop. HCG acts like luteinizing hormone (LH) by stimulating ovulation (release of an egg) in women.

detailsOne: Treating female infertility in certain women. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Serophene is an ovulatory stimulant. It works by increasing certain hormones, which causes your ovaries to release mature eggs.

detailsOne: Treating infertility in women who have not responded to other therapy.
detailsTwo: Bravelle is a human follicle-stimulating hormone. It works by stimulating the ovaries to produce eggs.

detailsOne: Treating infertility in women who have not responded to other therapy.
detailsTwo: Fertinex is a human follicle-stimulating hormone. It works by stimulating the ovaries to produce eggs.

detailsOne: Managing rheumatoid arthritis in patients who do not respond to or are intolerant of other medicines.
detailsTwo: Ridaura is an antirheumatic agent. The way Ridaura works is not fully understood.

detailsOne: Augmentin is a penicillin antibiotic.
detailsTwo: Augmentin contains a combination of amoxicillin and clavulanate potassium. Amoxicillin is an antibiotic in a group of drugs called penicillins. Amoxicillin fights bacteria in the body.

detailsOne: AmBisome (amphotericin B liposomal) is an antifungal medication that fights infections caused by fungus.
detailsTwo: AmBisome is used to treat serious, life-threatening fungal infections including leishmaniasis, and a certain form of
in people infected with HIV (human immunodeficiency virus).

detailsOne: Cipro (ciprofloxacin) is a fluoroquinolone (flor-o-KWIN-o-lone) antibiotic that fights bacteria in the body. Ciprofloxacin is used to treat different types of bacterial infections. Cipro is also used to treat people who have been exposed to
or certain types of
detailsTwo: Fluoroquinolone antibiotics can cause serious or disabling side effects. Cipro should be used only for infections that cannot be treated with a safer antibiotic.

detailsOne: Treating certain bacterial infections.
detailsTwo: Maxipime is a cephalosporin antibiotic. It works by killing sensitive bacteria.

detailsOne: Treating certain serious bacterial infections.
detailsTwo: Amikin is an aminoglycoside antibiotic. It works by inhibiting the production of bacterial proteins, which causes bacterial cell death.

detailsOne: Treating or preventing serious or severe bacterial infections.
detailsTwo: Vancocin is an antibiotic. It works by killing sensitive bacteria.

detailsOne: Zosyn contains a combination of piperacillin and tazobactam. Piperacillin and tazobactam are penicillin antibiotics that fight bacteria in the body.
detailsTwo: Zosyn is used to treat many different infections caused by bacteria, such as
, bone and joint infections, severe vaginal infections, stomach infections, skin infections, and

detailsOne: Treating infections caused by certain bacteria.
detailsTwo: Primaxin IV is a carbapenem antibiotic. It kills bacteria by blocking growth of the bacteria's cell wall.

detailsOne: Treating infections caused by certain bacteria.
detailsTwo: Augmentin XR extended-release tablets are a penicillin antibiotic. It works by killing sensitive bacteria.

detailsOne: Treating bacterial infections.
detailsTwo: Fortaz is a cephalosporin antibiotic. It works by killing sensitive bacteria.

detailsOne: Treating infections caused by certain bacteria.
detailsTwo: Amoclan suspension is a penicillin antibiotic. It works by killing sensitive bacteria.

detailsOne: Treating recurring ear infections in certain children.
detailsTwo: Augmentin ES-600 suspension is a penicillin antibiotic. It works by killing sensitive bacteria.

detailsOne: Treating serious infections caused by certain bacteria.
detailsTwo: Garamycin solution is an aminoglycoside antibiotic. It works by slowing the growth of, or killing, sensitive bacteria.

detailsOne: Preventing and treating serious infections caused by certain bacteria.
detailsTwo: Azactam is a monobactam antibiotic. It works by killing sensitive bacteria that cause infection.

detailsOne: Treating urinary tract infections caused by certain bacteria.
detailsTwo: Cipro XR extended-release tablets are a fluoroquinolone antibiotic. It works by killing sensitive bacteria.

detailsOne: Actos (pioglitazone) is an oral diabetes medicine that helps control blood sugar levels.
detailsTwo: Actos is for people with type 2 diabetes.

detailsOne: Treating and preventing gallstones. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Actigall is a bile acid naturally found in the body. It works by dissolving the cholesterol that makes gallstones and inhibiting production of cholesterol in the liver and absorption in the intestines, which helps to decrease the formation of gallstones. It can also reduce the amount of other bile acids that can be harmful to liver cells when levels are elevated.

detailsOne: Avandia (rosiglitazone) is an oral diabetes medicine that helps control blood sugar levels.
detailsTwo: Avandia is for people with
. Rosiglitazone is sometimes used in combination with other medicines, but it is not for treating type 1 diabetes.

detailsOne: Treating and preventing gallstones. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Urso is a bile acid naturally found in the body. It works by dissolving the cholesterol that makes gallstones and inhibiting production of cholesterol in the liver and absorption in the intestines, which helps to decrease the formation of gallstones. It can also reduce the amount of other bile acids that can be harmful to liver cells when levels are elevated.

detailsOne: Treating homocystinuria.
detailsTwo: Cystadane powder is a metabolic agent. It works by decreasing blood levels of homocysteine.

detailsOne: Ursodiol is a bile acid that decreases the amount of cholesterol produced by the liver and absorbed by the intestines. Ursodiol helps break down cholesterol that has formed into stones in the gallbladder. Ursodiol also increases bile flow in patients with primary biliary cirrhosis.
detailsTwo: Ursodiol is used to treat primary biliary cirrhosis.

detailsOne: Treating certain worm infections (eg, schistosoma, liver flukes).
detailsTwo: Biltricide is an anthelmintic agent. It works by killing sensitive worms.

detailsOne: Colcrys (colchicine) affects the way the body responds to uric acid crystals, which reduces swelling and pain.
detailsTwo: Because colchicine was developed prior to federal regulations requiring FDA review of all marketed drug products, not all uses for colchicine have been approved by the FDA. As of 2009, Colcrys is the only brand of colchicine that has been approved by the FDA.

detailsOne: Ilaris (canakinumab) is a monoclonal antibody that blocks certain proteins in the body that can affect inflammation and other immune responses. Ilaris is used to treat certain types of periodic fever syndromes, sometimes called auto-inflammatory syndromes.
detailsTwo: Periodic fever syndromes are rare and often inherited conditions caused by mutations in certain genes; usually genes that are involved in producing a certain protein or enzyme in the body. People with a periodic fever syndrome have episodes of fever and inflammation without other causes such as infection or virus.

detailsOne: Ergocalciferol is vitamin D2. Vitamin D is important for the absorption of calcium from the stomach and for the functioning of calcium in the body.
detailsTwo: Ergocalciferol is used to treat hypoparathyroidism (decreased functioning of the parathyroid glands).

detailsOne: Treating low parathyroid hormone levels, rickets (a vitamin D deficiency condition), and low phosphate levels in the body. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Drisdol is a form of vitamin D. It works by promoting proper absorption and use of calcium and phosphate in the body and helping to regulate parathyroid hormone levels.

detailsOne: Ergocalciferol is vitamin D2. Vitamin D is important for the absorption of calcium from the stomach and for the functioning of calcium in the body.
detailsTwo: Ergocalciferol is used to treat hypoparathyroidism (decreased functioning of the parathyroid glands).

detailsOne: Treating or preventing low vitamin D levels. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Calciferol solution is a vitamin. It works by increasing vitamin D levels in the body.

, and to lower the risk of stroke, heart attack, or other heart complications in people with type 2 diabetes, coronary heart disease, or other risk factors.

and triglycerides (types of fat) in the blood and to slow the build-up of plaque (fatty deposits) in your blood vessels.

detailsTwo: Juxtapid is used together with a low-fat diet and other treatments to lower total cholesterol in people with homozygous familial

detailsOne: Lowering high cholesterol in certain patients. It is used along with an appropriate diet. It is used in certain patients to reduce the risk of heart attack and chest pain caused by angina. It is also used to slow blood vessel blockage and to reduce the need for medical procedures to open blocked heart blood vessels. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Mevacor is an HMG-CoA reductase inhibitor, also known as a "statin." It works by reducing the production of certain fatty substances in the body, including cholesterol.

detailsTwo: Altoprev extended-release tablets are an HMG-CoA reductase inhibitor, also known as a "statin." It works by reducing the production of certain fatty substances in the body, including cholesterol.

detailsOne: Altocor is a cholesterol-lowering medication that blocks the production of cholesterol (a type of fat) in the body.
detailsTwo: Altocor reduces low-density lipoprotein (LDL) cholesterol and total cholesterol in the blood. Lowering your cholesterol can help prevent heart disease and hardening of the arteries, conditions that can lead to heart attack, stroke, and vascular disease.

detailsTwo: Periodic fever syndromes are rare and often inherited conditions caused by mutations in certain genes; usually genes that are involved in producing a certain protein or enzyme in the body. People with a periodic fever syndrome have episodes of fever and inflammation without other causes such as infection or virus.

detailsOne: Arcalyst (rilonacept) is used to treat some of the symptoms of rare genetic conditions such as Familial Cold Auto-inflammatory Syndrome (FCAS) or Muckle-Wells Syndrome (MWS).
detailsTwo: FCAS and MWS are inflammatory disorders in which the body develops certain symptoms without a known cause (such as virus, bacteria, or illness). These symptoms include fever, chills, fatigue, and joint pain. More serious symptoms may involve the bones and joints, the central nervous system (deafness, vision loss, mental impairment), or major organs such as the kidneys.

detailsOne: Celebrex (celecoxib) is a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID). Celecoxib works by reducing hormones that cause inflammation and pain in the body.
detailsTwo: Celebrex is used to treat pain or inflammation caused by many conditions such as
, and
. Celebrex is used to treat juvenile rheumatoid arthritis in children who are at least 2 years old.

detailsOne: Treating rheumatoid arthritis, osteoarthritis, or ankylosing spondylitis. It is used to treat gout or certain types of bursitis and tendonitis. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Clinoril is an NSAID. Exactly how it works is not known. It may block certain substances in the body that are linked to inflammation. NSAIDs treat the symptoms of pain and inflammation. They do not treat the disease that causes those symptoms.

detailsOne: Corifact (factor XIII) is used to prevent bleeding episodes in people with a hereditary bleeding disorder caused by a deficiency of Factor XIII.
detailsTwo: Corifact will not treat a bleeding episode that has already begun.

detailsOne: Coagulation factor X (10) is a man-made protein similar to a natural protein in the body that helps the blood to clot.
detailsTwo: Coagulation factor X is used to treat or prevent bleeding in people with hereditary factor X deficiency. This medication is for use in adults and children who are at least 12 years old.

detailsOne: The U.S. Food & Drug Administration (FDA) approved Sculptra (injectable poly-L-lactic acid) for the restoration and/or correction of the signs of facial fat loss (lipoatrophy) in people with human immunodeficiency virus (HIV). Facial lipoatrophy is the loss of fat beneath the skin, which can result in sunken cheeks, indentations, and hollow eyes. Lipoatrophy is common among HIV patients.
detailsTwo: Sculptra is a synthetic and biocompatible material that is injected below the surface of the skin in the area of fat loss. Sculptra contains microparticle beads of poly-L-lactic acid, a biocompatible, biodegradable, synthetic polymer from the alpha-hydroxy-acid family. Sculptra provides a gradual and significant increase in skin thickness, improving the appearance of folds and sunken areas.

The U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has approved Tretten (Coagulation Factor XIII A-Subunit [Recombinant]) for the routine prophylaxis of bleeding in people with congenital factor XIII (FXIII) A-subunit deficiency.

detailsOne: Fabrazyme (agalsidase beta) is a man-made form of the naturally-occurring alpha-galactosidase A enzyme. A deficiency of this enzyme is called Fabry disease. Agalsidase beta reduces deposits of globotriaosylceramide (GL-3) in the kidneys and certain other cells in the body.
detailsTwo: Fabrazyme is used in the treatment of Fabry disease.

detailsOne: Latisse (bimatoprost)is a manmade form of a naturally occurring substance called a prostaglandin.
detailsTwo: Latisse is used to treat hypotrichosis (abnormal growth of the eyelashes). Bimatoprost helps increase the growth, length, thickness, and darkness of eyelashes.

detailsOne: Treating inflammation (swelling, warmth, redness, pain) of the eyes and eyelids.
detailsTwo: FML ointment is a corticosteroid. Exactly how FML ointment works is unknown.

detailsOne: Treating inflammation (swelling, warmth, redness, pain) of the eyes and eyelids.
detailsTwo: Flarex suspension is a corticosteroid. Exactly how Flarex suspension works is unknown.

detailsOne: Fluorometholone is a steroid medicine. It prevents the release of substances in the body that cause inflammation.
detailsTwo: Fluorometholone ophthalmic (for the eyes) is used to treat eye swelling caused by infections, injury, surgery, or other conditions.

detailsOne: Naphazoline is a vasoconstrictor. It works by narrowing swollen blood vessels in the eyes to reduce eye redness.
detailsTwo: Pheniramine is an antihistamine that reduces the effects of natural chemical histamine in the body. Histamine can produce symptoms of itchy or watery eyes.

detailsOne: Temporarily relieving itchy, red eyes caused by allergies to things such as pollen, ragweed, grass, or animal hair and dander.
detailsTwo: Naphcon-A is a decongestant and antihistamine combination. The antihistamine works by blocking the action of histamine, which helps reduce symptoms such as watery, itchy eyes. The decongestant constricts (narrows) the blood vessels, which reduces eye redness.

detailsOne: Temporarily relieving redness, burning, and discomfort caused by minor eye irritation. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Visine AC drops are an eye decongestant and astringent. It works by constricting the blood vessels in the eye and coating the eye, which relieves redness and dryness.

detailsOne: Treating inflammation (swelling, warmth, redness, pain) of the eyes and eyelids.
detailsTwo: FML ointment is a corticosteroid. Exactly how FML ointment works is unknown.

detailsOne: Preventing or treating symptoms of hay fever and other upper respiratory allergies or the common cold, such as runny nose, sneezing, itching of the nose and throat, and itchy, watery eyes, and relieving cough. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Zymine syrup is an antihistamine. It works by blocking the action of histamine, reducing the symptoms of an allergic reaction.

detailsOne: Danazol is a man-made form of a steroid. Danazol affects the ovaries and pituitary gland and prevents the release of certain hormones in the body.

detailsOne: Immune globulin intravenous (IGIV) is a sterilized solution made from human plasma. It contains the antibodies to help your body protect itself against infection from various diseases.
detailsTwo: IGIV is used to treat primary immunodeficiency (PI), and to reduce the risk of infection in individuals with poorly functioning immune systems such as those with chronic lymphocytic leukemia (CLL). IGIV is also used to increase platelets (blood clotting cells) in people with idiopathic thrombocytopenic purpura (ITP) and to prevent aneurysm caused by a weakening of the main artery in the heart associated with Kawasaki syndrome.

detailsOne: Privigen (immune globulin intravenous (IGIV)) is a sterilized solution made from human plasma. It contains the antibodies to help your body protect itself against infection from various diseases.
detailsTwo: Privigen is used as a replacement therapy for primary humoral immunodeficiency (PI). This includes, but is not limited to congenital agammaglobulinemia, common variable immunodeficiency (CVID), X-linked agammaglobulinemia, Wiskott-Aldrich syndrome, and severe combined immunodeficiencies.
