detailsOne: Evzio (naloxone) blocks or reverses the effects of opioid medication, including extreme drowsiness, slowed breathing, or loss of consciousness. An opioid is sometimes called a narcotic.

detailsOne: Completely or partially reversing the effects of narcotics. It may also be used to diagnose overdose of narcotics. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Narcan is a narcotic antagonist. It works by blocking opiate receptor sites, which reverses or prevents toxic effects of narcotic (opioid) analgesics.

detailsOne: Narcan Nasal Spray contains naloxone hydrochloride. Naloxone blocks or reverses the effects of opioid medication, including extreme drowsiness, slowed breathing, or loss of consciousness. An opioid is sometimes called a narcotic.
detailsTwo: Narcan Nasal Spray is used to treat an
in an emergency situation. This medicine should not be used in place of emergency medical care for an overdose.

detailsOne: Treating myasthenia gravis. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Mestinon is a cholinesterase inhibitor. It works by improving nerve impulses in muscles so that the muscles are better able to work.

detailsOne: Treating myasthenia gravis. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Regonol is a cholinesterase inhibitor. It works by improving nerve impulses in muscles so that the muscles are better able to work.

detailsOne: Edrophonium is used as part of a medical test to help diagnose a muscle disorder called myasthenia gravis.
detailsTwo: Edrophonium is sometimes used to reverse the effects of certain medications used to prevent muscle contractions during surgical procedures.

detailsOne: Pyridostigmine affects chemicals in the body that are involved in the communication between nerve impulses and muscle movement.
detailsTwo: Pyridostigmine is used to treat the symptoms of myasthenia gravis. It is also used in military personnel who have been exposed to nerve gas.

detailsOne: e-droe-FOE-nee-um
Sugammadex reverses the effects of certain medications that are given during surgical procedures to relax your muscles.
detailsTwo: Sugammadex is used at the end of surgery, to help restore muscle function that has been blocked during surgery by the other medicines.

detailsOne: Idarucizumab is a drug that reverses the effects of another medicine called dabigatran (Pradaxa). Dabigatran is used to prevent blood clots and strokes in people with certain heart disorders. Because the medicine keeps the blood from clotting, people taking dabigatran can bleed more easily.
detailsTwo: Idarucizumab is used during a medical emergency to treat severe or uncontrolled bleeding that has been caused by taking dabigatran.

detailsOne: The United States Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has approved OraVerse (phentolamine mesylate) for the reversal of soft-tissue anesthesia and the associated functional deficits resulting from a local dental anesthetic.
detailsTwo: The approval of OraVerse for use in adults and children is based on data from several clinical studies, including two Phase 3 studies in adults and adolescents age 12 and older and a Phase 2 pediatric study. The two Phase 3 studies were conducted in 18 centers across the United States, including leading dental schools, clinical research organizations and private clinics. There were 484 dental patients enrolled across the two studies.

detailsOne: Treating minor aches and pains (eg, caused by headache, muscle aches, backache, arthritis, the common cold, toothache, menstrual cramps). It is used in certain patients to decrease the risk of stroke, heart attack, and death associated with stroke or heart attack. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Bayer is a salicylate. It works by inhibiting several different chemical processes within the body that cause pain, inflammation, and fever. It also reduces the tendency for blood to clot.

The U.S. Food and Drug Administration has approved Kcentra (Prothrombin Complex Concentrate, Human) for the urgent reversal of vitamin K antagonist (VKA) anticoagulation in adults with acute major bleeding. Plasma is the only other product approved for this use in the United States.

detailsOne: Pravachol (pravastatin) belongs to a group of drugs called HMG CoA reductase inhibitors, or "statins." Pravastatin reduces levels of "bad" cholesterol (low-density lipoprotein, or LDL) and triglycerides in the blood, while increasing levels of "good" cholesterol (high-density lipoprotein, or HDL).
detailsTwo: Pravachol is used to lower
and triglycerides (types of fat) in the blood.

detailsTwo: Aspirin is used to treat pain, and reduce fever or inflammation. Aspirin is sometimes used to treat or prevent heart attacks, strokes, and chest pain (angina). Aspirin should be used for cardiovascular conditions only under the supervision of a doctor.

detailsOne: Bactrim contains a combination of sulfamethoxazole and trimethoprim. Sulfamethoxazole and trimethoprim are are both antibiotics that treat different types of infection caused by bacteria.
detailsTwo: Bactrim is used to treat ear infections, urinary tract infections, bronchitis, traveler's diarrhea, shigellosis, and Pneumocystis jiroveci pneumonia.

detailsOne: Treating infections caused by certain bacteria. It is also used to prevent certain infections.
detailsTwo: Bactrim DS is an antibiotic combination containing a sulfonamide antibiotic. It works by killing sensitive bacteria.

detailsOne: Treating certain bacterial infections. It may be used in combination with other medicines to treat acne or certain amoeba infections. It may be used to prevent certain types of malaria in travelers who will be visiting malaria-infected areas for less than 4 months. It may also be used to prevent or slow the progression of anthrax after exposure.
detailsTwo: Doryx delayed-release capsules are a tetracycline antibiotic. It works by slowing the growth of bacteria. Slowing the bacteria's growth allows the body's immune system to destroy the bacteria.

detailsOne: Ceftin (cefuroxime) is a cephalosporin (SEF a low spor in) antibiotic. It works by fighting bacteria in your body.
detailsTwo: Ceftin is used to treat many kinds of bacterial infections, including severe or life-threatening forms.

detailsOne: Septra contains a combination of sulfamethoxazole and trimethoprim. Sulfamethoxazole and trimethoprim are are both antibiotics that treat different types of infection caused by bacteria.
detailsTwo: Septra is used to treat ear infections, urinary tract infections, bronchitis, traveler's diarrhea, shigellosis, and Pneumocystis jiroveci pneumonia.

detailsOne: Treating certain bacterial infections. It may be used in combination with other medicines to treat acne or certain amoeba infections. detailsTwo: Vibramycin is a tetracycline antibiotic. It works by slowing the growth of bacteria. Slowing the bacteria's growth allows the body's immune system to destroy the bacteria.

detailsOne: Nitric oxide is a gas that is inhaled. It works by relaxing smooth muscle to widen (dilate) blood vessels, especially in the lungs.
detailsTwo: Nitric oxide is used together with a breathing machine (ventilator) to treat respiratory failure in premature babies.

detailsOne: Preventing certain types of kidney stones. It also may be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Urocit-K is a urinary alkalinizing agent. It works by neutralizing some of the acid in the urine, which helps reduce the formation of crystals.

detailsOne: Lasix (furosemide) is a loop diuretic (water pill) that prevents your body from absorbing too much salt. This allows the salt to instead be passed in your urine.
detailsTwo: Lasix is used to treat fluid retention (
) in people with
, liver disease, or a kidney disorder such as nephrotic syndrome.

detailsOne: Preventing kidney transplant rejection when used along with other medicines. It may also be used to reduce signs and symptoms of active rheumatoid arthritis. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Imuran is an antimetabolite. It works by decreasing the effects of certain cells in the body's immune system.

detailsOne: Treating acute kidney transplant rejection with other medicines used to suppress the immune system. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Thymoglobulin is an immune globulin. It works by suppressing the body's immune response, but the way it does this is not fully understood.

detailsOne: Lymphocyte immune globulin anti-thymocyte (also called equine anti-thymocyte immune globulin), is an immunosuppressant that lowers your body's immune system. The immune system helps your body fight infections. The immune system can also fight or "reject" a transplanted organ such as a liver or kidney. This is because the immune system treats the new organ as an invader.
detailsTwo: Lymphocyte immune globulin is used to treat or prevent organ rejection after a kidney transplant. Lymphocyte immune globulin is also used to treat aplastic anemia (a condition in which your bone marrow does not produce enough new blood cells).

detailsOne: Preventing kidney transplant rejection when used along with other medicines. It may also be used to reduce signs and symptoms of active rheumatoid arthritis. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Azasan is an antimetabolite. It works by decreasing the effects of certain cells in the body's immune system.

detailsOne: Managing certain conditions caused by high or low parathyroid hormone levels. It is used to manage low blood calcium levels in patients who are on chronic kidney dialysis. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Rocaltrol is a form of vitamin D. It works by promoting proper absorption and use of calcium and phosphate by the body in normal bone development and maintenance.

detailsOne: Ergocalciferol is vitamin D2. Vitamin D is important for the absorption of calcium from the stomach and for the functioning of calcium in the body.
detailsTwo: Ergocalciferol is used to treat hypoparathyroidism (decreased functioning of the parathyroid glands).

detailsOne: Treating or preventing low vitamin D levels. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Calciferol solution is a vitamin. It works by increasing vitamin D levels in the body.

detailsOne: Treating low parathyroid hormone levels, rickets (a vitamin D deficiency condition), and low phosphate levels in the body. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Drisdol is a form of vitamin D. It works by promoting proper absorption and use of calcium and phosphate in the body and helping to regulate parathyroid hormone levels.

detailsOne: Ergocalciferol is vitamin D2. Vitamin D is important for the absorption of calcium from the stomach and for the functioning of calcium in the body.
detailsTwo: Ergocalciferol is used to treat hypoparathyroidism (decreased functioning of the parathyroid glands).

detailsOne: Iodixanol is in a group of drugs called radiopaque (RAY dee oh payk) contrast agents. Iodixanol contains iodine, a substance that absorbs x-rays. Radiopaque contrast agents are used to allow blood vessels, organs, and other non-bony tissues to be seen more clearly on a CT scan or other radiologic (x-ray) examination.
detailsTwo: Iodixanol is used to help diagnose certain disorders of the brain, blood vessels, and kidneys.

detailsOne: Treating organ rejection after a kidney transplant. It is also used to treat organ rejection in patients with a heart or liver transplant if corticosteroids do not work well. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Orthoclone OKT 3 is an immunosuppressant. It blocks the action of certain blood cells (eg, T lymphocytes) that can cause the body to reject the transplanted organ.

detailsOne: Myfortic (mycophenolic acid) is an immunosuppressant. Your body may "reject" an organ transplant when the immune system treats the new organ as an invader. An immunosuppressant helps to prevent this rejection.
detailsTwo: Myfortic is used to prevent your body from rejecting a
. Myfortic is usually given with cyclosporine and a steroid medicine.

detailsOne: Dilating the eye before an exam or surgery and preventing the eye from focusing.
detailsTwo: Cyclogyl is an anticholinergic agent. It works by relaxing the muscle of the eye to cause the pupil to dilate or widen.

detailsOne: Widening (dilating) the pupils for an eye exam or to treat certain inflammatory conditions of the eye. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Atropin-Care drops are an anticholinergic agent. It works by blocking the chemical acetylcholine, which relaxes the ciliary muscle of the eye and causes the pupil to dilate.

detailsOne: Dilating the pupil and paralyzing certain muscles in the eye for diagnostic tests. It may also be used for other conditions as determined by your doctor.
detailsTwo: Mydriacyl is an anticholinergic. It works by relaxing the muscles of the eye to cause the pupil to dilate or widen (mydriasis).

detailsOne: Tropicamide causes muscles in the eye to become relaxed. This dilates (widens) the pupil so that it does not react (narrow) when your doctor shines an examination light into your eye.

detailsOne: Cyclopentolate relaxes muscles in your eye to dilate (widen) your pupil.

Treating HIV infection when used along with other medicines. It is also used with other medicines to help prevent women from passing the HIV virus to the fetus during pregnancy.
